GK16jgrasg1u:10: pāṣāṇād api pīyūṣaṃ syandate yasya līlayā/
GK16jgrasg1u:18: tathāpi kleśo me katham api gatārtho na bhavitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:19: timīndrāḥ saṃkṣobhaṃ vidadhatu payodheḥ punar ime
GK16jgrasg1u:22: kāvyaṃ mayātra nihitaṃ na parasya kiṃcit/
GK16jgrasg1u:28: kiṃ ca kulāni kavīnāṃ nisargasamyañci rañjayatu//
GK16jgrasg1u:29_1: kavisahṛdayayor āvaśyakatayā guṇālaṃkārādibhir nirūpaṇīye tasmin viśeṣyatāvacchedakaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:29_2: taditarabhedabuddhau sādhanaṃ ca tallakṣaṇaṃ tāvan nirūpyate--
GK16jgrasg1u:33: kāraṇāṃ ca tadavacchinne bhāvanāviśeṣaḥ punaḥpunar anusaṃdhānātmā/
GK16jgrasg1u:35: ” “dhanaṃ te dāsyāmi” iti vākyārthadhījanyasyāhlādasya na lokottaratvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:39: svaviśiṣṭajanakatāvacchedakārthapratipādakatāsaṃsargeṇā camatkāratvavattvam eva vā kāvyatvam iti phalitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:40: yat tu prāñcaḥ “adoṣau saguṇau sālaṃkārau śabdārthau kāvyam” ity āhuḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:49: yadi kāvyapadārthatayā parābhimate śabdārthayugale kāvyaśabdaśakteḥ pramāpakaṃ dṛḍhataraṃ kim api pramāṇāṃ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:53: prāg uktād vyavahārataḥ śabdaviśeṣe siddhyantīṃ śaktiṃ ko nāma nivārayitum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:54: etena vinigamanābhāvād ubhayatra śaktir iti pratyuktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:55: tadevaṃ śabdaviśeṣasyaiva kāvyapadārthatve siddhe tasyaiva lakṣaṇaṃ vaktuṃ yuktam,
GK16jgrasg1u:59: yat tv āsvādodbodhakatvam eva kāvyatvaprayojakaṃ tacca śabde cārthe cāviśiṣṭam ity āhuḥ, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:61: kiṃ bahunā nāṭyāṅgānāṃ sarveṣām api prāyaśas tathātvena tatvāpāttir durvāraiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:62: etena rasodbodhasamarthasyaivātra lakṣyatvam ity api parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:66: eko na dvāv iti vyavahārasyeva ślokavākyaṃ na kāvyam iti vyavahārasyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:71: “uditaṃ maṇḍalaṃ vidhoḥ” iti kāvye dūtyabhisārikāvirahiṇyādisamudīrite 'bhisaraṇavidhiniṣedhajīvanābhāvādipareḥ “gato 'stam arkaḥ” ityādau cāvyāptyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:72: na cedam akāvyam iti śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:76: duṣṭa kāvyam iti vyavahārasya bādhakaṃ vinā lākṣaṇikatvāyogāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:77: na ca saṃyogābhāvavān vṛkṣaḥ saṃyogītivad aṃśabhedena/
GK16jgrasg1u:78: doṣarahitaṃ duṣṭam iti vyavahāre bādhakaṃ nāstīti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:80: na śākhāyām” iti pratīter ivedaṃ padyaṃ pūrvārdhe kāvyam uttarārdhe tu na kāvyam iti svarasavāhino viśvajanīnānubhavasya virahād avyāpyavṛttitāyā api tasyāyogāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:82: hārādivad upaskārakāṇām alaṃkārāṇāṃ ca śarīraghaṭakatvānupapatteś ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:83: yat tu “rasavad eva kāvyam” iti sāhityadarpaṇe nirṇītam, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:87: tathā ca jalapravāhaveganipatanotpatanabhramaṇāni kavibhir varṇitāni kapibālādivilasitāni ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:88: na ca tatrāpi yathākathaṃcit paramparayā rasasparśo 'sty eveti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:92: tasya ca kāraṇaṃ kavigatā kevalā pratibhā/
GK16jgrasg1u:94: tadgataṃ ca pratibhātvaṃ kāvyakāraṇatāvacchedakatayā siddho jātiviśeṣa upādhirūpaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:95: vākhaṇḍam/ tasyāś ca hetuḥ kvacid devatāmahāpuruṣaprasādādijanyam adṛṣṭam/
GK16jgrasg1u:98: bālādes tau vināpi kevalān mahāpuruṣaprasādād api pratibhotpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:99: na tatra tayor janmāntarīyayoḥ kalpanaṃ vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:101: loke hi balavatā pramāṇenāgamādinā sati kāraṇātānirṇāye paścād upasthitasya vyabhicārasya vāraṇāya janmāntarīyam anyathānupapattyā kāraṇaṃ dharmādharmādi kalpyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:102: anyathā tu vyabhicāropasthityā pūrvavṛttakāraṇatānirṇāye bhramatvapratipattir eva jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:103: nāpi kevalam adṛṣṭam eva kāraṇam ity api śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:104: kiyantaṃcit kālaṃ kāvyaṃ kartum aśaknuvataḥ katham api saṃjātayor vyutpattyabhyāsayoḥ pratibhāyāḥ prādurbhāvasya darśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:105: tatrāpy adṛṣṭasyāṅgīkāre prāg api tābhyāṃ tasyāḥ prasakteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:106: na ca tatra pratibhāyāḥ pratibandhakam adṛṣṭāntaraṃ kalpyam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:107: tādṛśāneka sthalagatādṛṣṭadvayakalpanāpekṣayā kḷptavyutpattyabhyāsayor eva pratibhāhetutvakalpane lāghavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:109: tādṛśādṛṣṭasya tādṛśavyutpattyabhyāsayoś ca pratibhāgataṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ kāryatāvacchedakam,
GK16jgrasg1u:112: pratibhāgatavailakṣaṇyam eva vā vilakṣaṇakāvyaṃ pratīti nātrāpi saḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:113: na ca sator api vyutpatyabhyāsayor yatra na pratibhotpattis tatrānvayavyabhicāra iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:115: pāpaviśeṣasya tatra pratibandhakatvakalpanād vā na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:116: pratibandhakābhāvasya ca kāraṇatā samuditaśaktyāditrayahetutāvādinaḥ śaktimātrahetutāvādinaś cāviśiṣṭā/
GK16jgrasg1u:117: prativādinā mantrādibhiḥ kṛte katipayadivasavyāpini vākstambhe vihitānekaprabandhasyāpi kaveḥ kāvyānudayasya darśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:119: śabdārthau yatra guṇībhāvitātmānau kamapyartham abhivyaṅktas tad ādyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:122: aparāṅgavācyasiddhyaṅgavyaṅgyasyāpi camatkāritayā tadvāraṇāya guṇībhāvitātmānāv iti svāpekṣayā vyaṅgyaprādhānyābhiprāyakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:132: na ca yady ayaṃ śayitaḥ syāt tadāsyānanāmbujaṃ cumbeyam iti nāyikecchāyā eva vyaṅgayatvam atreti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:133: manorathān saphalīkartum asamarthetyanena manorathāḥ sarve 'syā hṛdi tiṣṭanti iti pratīteḥ svaśabdena manorathapadena sāmānyākāreṇa tādṛśecchāyā api nivedanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:134: na ca manorathapadena manorathatvākāreṇā sāmānyecchāyā abhidhāne 'pi cumbeyam iti viṣayaviśeṣaviśiṣṭecchātvena vyaṅgyatve kiṃ bādhakam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:136: na hi viśeṣākāreṇa vyaṅgyo 'pi sāmānyākāreṇābhihito 'rthaḥ sahṛdayānāṃ camatkṛtim utpādayitum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:137: katham api vācyavṛttyanāliṅgitasyaiva vyaṅgyasya camatkāritvenālaṃkārikaiḥ svīkārāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:138: cumbanecchāyā ratyanubhāvatayaiva sundaratvena tadavyañjane cumbāmīti śabdabalāc cumbanecchāvad acamatkāritvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:139: evaṃ trapāyā api na prādhānyena vyaṅgyatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:141: na ca daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇaṃ vidheyam iti nānuvādyatāvacchedakatvaṃ tasyā iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:142: evam api nayanagatadaramīlanasya tatkāryatve 'pi daramīlannayanātvaviśiṣṭanirīkṣaṇasya ratimātrakāryatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:143: trapāyā eva mukhyatvena vyaṅgyatve nirīkṣaṇokter anatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:144: vācyavṛttyā rater anubhāve nirīkṣaṇo trapāyā anubhāvasya daramīlanasyeva vyañjanayā tasyāṃ tasyā api guṇībhāvapratyayaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:146: gurumadhyagatā mayā natāṅgī nihatā nīrajakorakeṇa mandam/
GK16jgrasg1u:148: atra ghūrṇitāsīd ityanenāsamīkṣyakārin kimidam anucitaṃ kṛtavān asīty arthasamvalito 'marṣaś carvaṇāviśrāntidhāmatvāt prādhānyena vyajyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:151: “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ śvāsāsaṅga na yā sehe/
GK16jgrasg1u:152: samprati sā hṛdayagataṃ priyapāṇiṃ mandam ākṣipati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:153_0: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitaprabandhagatatvena pūrvasākāṅkṣam iti diṅmātreṇa vyākhyāyate
GK16jgrasg1u:153_1: --- yā navavadhūḥ palyaṅkaśayitā śvāsasyāsaṅgamātreṇāpi saṃkucad aṅgalatikābhūt sā
GK16jgrasg1u:153_2: samprati prasthānapūrvarajanyāṃ pravatsyatpatikā priyeṇa saśaṅkena samarpitaṃ hṛdi
GK16jgrasg1u:155: atra śanaiḥ svasthānaprāpaṇātmanā mandākṣepeṇa ratyākhyaḥ sthāyī saṃlakṣyakramatayā vyajyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:157: amum eva ca prabhedaṃ dhvanim āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:158_0: yat tu citramīmāṃsāyām appayyadīkṣitaiḥ “niḥśeṣacyutacandanam” iti padyaṃ dhvanyudāharaṇaprasaṅge
GK16jgrasg1u:160: snāne hi sarvatra candana cyutiḥ syāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:161: tava tu stanayos taṭa upari bhāga eva dṛśyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:163: tathā nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dhara ity atra tāmbūlagrahaṇavilambāt prācīnarāgasya kiṃcin mṛṣṭatety anyathāsiddhiparihārāya nirmṛṣṭarāga iti rāgasya niḥśeṣamṛṣṭatoktā/
GK16jgrasg1u:164: punaḥ snānasādhāraṇyavartanena saṃbhogacihnodghāṭanāyādhara iti viśiṣya grahaṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:167: “taṭādighaṭitā vākyārthāḥ snānavyāvṛttidvārā saṃbhogāṅgānām āśleṣacumbanādīnāṃ pratipādanena pradhānavyaṅgyavyañjane sāhāyakam ācaranti iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:170: tathā hi-- pañcamollāsaśeṣe “niḥśeṣetyādau gamakatayā yāni candanacyavanādīny upāttāni tāni kāraṇāntarato 'pi bhavanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:171: yataś cātraiva snānakāryatvenopāttānīti nopabhoga eva pratibaddhānīty anaikāntikāni iti kāvyaprakāśakṛtoktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:173: “bhama dhammia vīsattho so suṇao ajja mālido teṇa/
GK16jgrasg1u:175: ityādau liṅgajaliṅgijñānarūpeṇānumānena vyaktiṃ gatārthayato vyaktivivekakṛto mataṃ pratyācakṣāṇena vyabhicāritvenāsiddhatvena ca saṃdihyamānād api liṅgād vyañjanam abhyupagatam/
GK16jgrasg1u:177: evaṃ ca vyañjakānāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatāṃ prāmāṇikānāṃ granthaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇyaṃ pratipādayatas tava granthasya virodhaḥ sphuṭaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:178: kiṃ ca yad idaṃ niḥśeṣetyādyavāntaravākyārthānāṃ vāpīsnānavyāvṛttidvāreṇa vyaṅgyāsādhāraṇyaṃ saṃpādyate tat kim artham iti pṛcchāmaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:182: maha mandabhāiṇīe keraṃ sahi tuha paribhavai//“
GK16jgrasg1u:183: ityādau sādhāraṇānām evaunnidryādīnāṃ vaktrādivaiśiṣṭyavaśād arthaviśeṣavyañjakatāyā abhyupagateḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:186: salilārdravasanakaraṇakaproñchanādināpi tatsambhavād iti cet tarhi vāpīsnānavyāvartanena kaḥ puruṣārthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:187: ekatrānaikāntikatvasyeva bahuṣv anaikāntikatāyā api jñātāyā anumitipratikūlatvād vyaktyapratikūlatvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:188: api cātra hi tadantikam eva rantuṃ gatāsīti vyaṅgyaśarīre tadantikagamanaṃ ramaṇarūpaphalāṃśaś ceti dvayaṃ ghaṭakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:189: tatra tāvat tadantikaṃ gatāsītyaṃśasya tvanmate vyaṅgyatvaṃ durupapādam/
GK16jgrasg1u:190_2: na gateti śabdābhyāṃ virodhilakṣaṇayā niṣedhasya vidheś ca pratīter upapatteḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:192: yathā “aho pūrṇaṃ saro yatra luṭhantaḥ snānti mānavāḥ” ityatra kartṛviśeṣaṇānupapattyadhīnollāse pūrṇatvābhāve/
GK16jgrasg1u:193: atha tadantikagamanasya lakṣaṇāvedyatve 'pi ramaṇasya phalāṃśasya lakṣyaśaktimūladhvananavedyatvam avyāhatam eveti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:194: “adhamatvam aprakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā vā bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:195: tatra jātyāpakarṣaṃ nottamanāyikā nāyakasya vākti” ityādinā saṃdarbheṇa bhavataivārthāpattivedyatāyāḥ sphuṭaṃ vacanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:197: anyac ca yathā kathaṃcid aṅgīkuru vātra vyañjanāvyāpāraṃ tathāpi na taveṣṭasiddhiḥ/ vācyānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:198: niḥśeṣacyutacandanastanataṭatvādīnām adhamatvasya ca tvaduktarītyā prakārāntareṇānupapadyamānatayā dūtīsaṃbhogamātraniṣpādyatvena guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaprasaṅgāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:201: tathā hi-- ayi bāndhavajanasyājñātapīḍāgame svārthaparāyaṇe snānakālātikramabhayavaśena nadīmadīyapriyayor antikam agatvaiva vāpīṃ snātum ito mamāntikād gatāsi,
GK16jgrasg1u:203: yato niḥśeṣacyutacandanaṃ stanayos taṭam eva noraḥsthalam,
GK16jgrasg1u:205: evaṃ tvarayā samyag akṣālanenottaroṣṭho na nirmṛṣṭarāgo 'dharas tu tadapekṣayā gaṇḍūṣajalaradanaśodhanāṅgulyādīnām adhikasaṃmardam āvahatīti tathā/
GK16jgrasg1u:206: kiṃ ca samyag akṣālanena netre jalamātrasaṃsagad dūram uparibhāga evānañjane/
GK16jgrasg1u:207: śītavaśāt tānavāc ca tava tanuḥ pulakiteti/
GK16jgrasg1u:210: evaṃ sādhāraṇoṣv eṣu vākyārtheṣu mukhyārthe bādhābhāvāt tātparyārthasya jhaṭity anākalanāt kuto 'tra lakṣaṇāvakāśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:211_0: anantaraṃ ca vācyārthapratipatter vaktṛboddhavyanāyakādīnāṃ vaiśiṣṭyasya pratītau
GK16jgrasg1u:211_1: satyām adhamapadena svapravṛttiprayojako duḥkhadātṛtvarūpo dharmaḥ sādhāraṇātmā vācyārthadaśayām
GK16jgrasg1u:212: etena “adhamatvam apakṛṣṭatvaṃ tac ca jātyā karmaṇā vā bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:216: soḍham eveti nodghāṭanārham itītaravyāvṛtyā saṃbhogarūpam eva paryavasyati” iti yad uktam,
GK16jgrasg1u:218_1: prakāśayitum atitamām anaucityena prācīnānām eva soḍhānām apy aparādhānām asahyatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:219: yatra vyaṅgyam apradhānam eva saccamatkārakāraṇaṃ tad dvitīyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:220: vācyāpekṣayā pradhānībhūtaṃ vyaṅgyāntaram ādaya guṇībhūtaṃ vyaṅgyam ādāyātivyāptivāraṇāyāvadhāraṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:223: yat tu “atādṛśi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyam” ityādi kāvyaprakāśagatalakṣaṇe citrānyatvaṃ ṭīkākārair dattam, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:228: śiśire sukhaṃ śayānāḥ kapayaḥ kupyanti pavanatanayāya//“
GK16jgrasg1u:229_0: atra jānakīkuśalāvedanena rāghavaḥ śiśirīkṛta iti vyaṅgyam ākasmikakapikartṛkahanumadviṣayakakopopapādakatayā
GK16jgrasg1u:229_1: guṇībhūtam api durdāivavaśato dāsyam anubhavad rājakalatram iva kām api kamanīyatām āvahati /
GK16jgrasg1u:230: nanv evaṃ prāg uktam ākṣepagataṃ māndyam api navavadhūprakṛtivirodhād anupapadyamānaṃ vyaṅgyenaivopapādyata iti katham uttamottamatā tasya kāvyasyeti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:231: yato hy anudinasakhyupadeśādibhir anaticamatkāribhir apy upapadyamānaṃ māndyam idaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:232: prathamacittacumbinīṃ vipralambharatim aprakāśayan na prabhavati svātantryeṇa paranirvṛticarvaṇāgocaratām ādhātum/
GK16jgrasg1u:233: ittham eva niḥśeṣacyutacandanam ityādipadyeṣv adhamatvādīni vācyāni vyaṅgyātiriktenārthenāpātato niṣpannaśarīrāṇi vyañjakānīti na tatrāpi guṇībhāvaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:234: anayor bhedayor anapahnavanīyacamatkārayor api prādhānyāprādhānyābhyām asti kaścit sahṛdayavedyo viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:237: kim uta sakale yāte vāhni priya tvam ihaiṣyasi/
GK16jgrasg1u:240: ity atra sakalam ahaḥ paramāvadhis tataḥ paraṃ prāṇāndhārayituṃ na śaknomīti vyaṅgyaṃ priyagamananivāraṇarūpavācyasiddhyaṅgam ato guṇībhūtavyaṅgyam” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:242: sa bāṣpagalajjalānāṃ praharaviratāv ityādyālāpānām eva priyagamananivāraṇarūpavācyasiddhyaṅgatayā vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvābhāvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:243: ālāpair iti tṛtīyayā prakṛtyarthasya haraṇakriyākaraṇatāyāḥ sphuṭaṃ pratipatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:244: na ca vyaṅgyasyāpi vācyasiddhyaṅgatātra saṃbhavatīti tathoktam iti vācyam/

GK16jgrasg1u:246_0: astu vā tataḥ paraṃ prāṇān dhārayituṃ na śaknomīti vyaṅgyasya vācyasiddhyaṅgatayā

GK16jgrasg1u:253: anayor eva dvitīyatṛtīyabhedayor jāgarūkājāgarūkaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ praviṣṭaṃ nikhilam alaṃkārapradhānaṃ kāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:254: yatrārthacamatkṛtyupaskṛtā śabdacamatkṛtiḥ pradhānaṃ tad adhamaṃ caturtham// yathā--

GK16jgrasg1u:262: kecid imān api caturo bhedān agaṇayanta uttamamadhyamādhamabhāvena trividham eva kāvyam ācakṣate/

GK16jgrasg1u:268: śabdārthacamatkṛtyor aikādhikaraṇyaṃ tatra tayor guṇapradhānabhāvaṃ paryālocya yathālakṣaṇaṃ vyavahartavyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:274: saṃghātaḥ ko 'pi dhāmnām ayam udayagiriprāntataḥ prādurāsīt//“

GK16jgrasg1u:285: evaṃ pañcātmake dhvanau paramaramaṇīyatayā rasadhvanes tadātmā rasas tāvad abhidhīyate--

GK16jgrasg1u:289_0: cintādibhiḥ sahakāribhiś ca saṃbhūya prādurbhāvitenālaukikena vyāpāreṇa tatkālanivartitānandāṃśāvaraṇājñānenāta
GK16jgrasg1u:289_1: eva pramuṣṭaparimitapramātṛtvādinijadharmeṇa pramātrā svaprakāśatayā vāstavena nijasvarūpānandena
GK16jgrasg1u:289_2: saha gocarīkriyamāṇaḥ pragviniviṣṭavāsanārūpo ratyādir eva rasaḥ //
GK16jgrasg1u:294: yathā hi śarāvādinā pihito dīpas tannivṛttau saṃnihitān padārthān prakāśayati svayaṃ ca prakāśate,
GK16jgrasg1u:297: vibhāvādīnām api svapnaturagādīnām iva raṅgarajatādīnām iva sākṣibhāsyatvam aviruddham/
GK16jgrasg1u:298: vyañjakavibhāvādicarvaṇāyā āvaraṇabhaṅgasya votpattivināśābhyām utpattivināśau rase upacaryete varṇanityatāyām iva vyañjakatālvādivyāpārasya gakārādau/
GK16jgrasg1u:300: nivṛttāyāṃ tasyāṃ prakāśasyāvṛtatvād vidyamāno 'pi sthāyī na prakāśate/
GK16jgrasg1u:301: yad vā vibhāvādicarvaṇāmāhimnā sahṛdayasya nijasahṛdayatāvaśonmiṣitena tattatsthāyyupahitasvasvarūpānandākārā samādhāv iva yoginaś cittavṛttir upajāyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:305: itthaṃ cābhinavaguptamammaṭabhaṭṭādigranthasvārasyena bhagnāvaraṇacidviśiṣṭo ratyādiḥ sthāyī bhāvo rasa iti sthitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:306: vastutas tu vakṣyamāṇaśrutisvārasyena ratyādyavacchinna bhagnāvaraṇā cid eva rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:307: sarvathaiva cāsyā viśiṣṭātmano viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ vā cidaṃśam ādāya nityatvaṃ svaprakāśatvaṃ ca siddham/
GK16jgrasg1u:308: ratyādyaṃśam ādāya tv anityatvam itarabhāsyatvaṃ ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:314: athāsyāṃ sukhāṃśabhāne kiṃ mānam iti cet samādhāv api tadbhāne kiṃ mānam iti paryanuyogasya tulyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:316: ityādiḥ śabdo 'sti tatra mānam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:318: rasaṃ hy evāyaṃ labdhvānandī bhavati” iti śrutiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:321: yeyaṃ dvitīyapakṣe tadākāracittavṛttyātmikā rasacarvaṇopanyastā sā śabdavyāpārabhāvyatvāc chābdī/
GK16jgrasg1u:334: svātmani duṣyantādyabhedabuddhir eva tatheti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:335: nāyake dharādhaureyatvadhīratvāder ātmani cādhunikatvakāpuruṣatvāder vāidharmyasya sphuṭaṃ pratipatter abhedabodhasyaiva durlabhatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:340: cintopanītānāṃ teṣām eva padārthānāṃ mānasyāḥ pratīter asyā vailakṣaṇyopalambhāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:346: tṛtīyasya bhogakṛttvavyāpārasya mahimnā nigīrṇayo rajastamasor udriktasattvajanitena nijacitsvabhāvanirvṛtiviśrāntilakṣaṇena
GK16jgrasg1u:347: sākṣātkāreṇa viṣayīkṛto bhāvanopanītaḥ sādhāraṇātmā ratyādiḥ sthāyī rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:351: evaṃ ca trayo 'mśāḥ kāvyasya-- “abhidhā bhāvanā caiva tadbhogīkṛtir eva ca” ity āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:352: matasyaitasya pūrvasmān matād bhāvakatvavyāpārāntarasvīkāra eva viśeṣa/

GK16jgrasg1u:356_1: duṣyantādau śakuntalādiratau gṛhītāyām anantaraṃ ca sahṛdayatollāsitasya bhāvanāviśeṣarūpasya
GK16jgrasg1u:356_2: doṣasya mahimnā kalpitaduṣyantatvāvacchādite svātmany ajñānāvacchinne śuktikāśakala
GK16jgrasg1u:356_3: iva rajatakhaṇḍaḥ samutpadyamāno 'nirvacanīyaḥ sākṣibhāsyaḥ śakuntalādiviṣayakaratyādir eva rasaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:360: svapūrvopasthitena ratyādinā tadagrahāt tadratitvenaikatvādhyavasānād vā vyaṅgyo varṇanīyaś cocyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:363: etena duṣyantādiniṣṭhasya ratyāder anāsvādyatvān na rasatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:364: svaniṣṭhasya tu tasya śakuntalādibhir atatsaṃbandhibhiḥ katham abhivyaktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:366_0: yad api vibhāvādīnāṃ sādhāraṇyaṃ prācīnair uktaṃ tad api kāvyena śakuntalādiśabdaiḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:366_1: śakuntalātvādiprakārakabodhajanakaiḥ pratipādyamāneṣu śakuntalādiṣu doṣaviśeṣakalpanaṃ vinā durupapādam /
GK16jgrasg1u:367: ato 'vaśyakalpye doṣaviśeṣe tenaiva svātmani duṣyantādyabhedabuddhir api sūpapādā/
GK16jgrasg1u:368: nanv evam api rater astu nāma duṣyanta iva sahṛdaye 'pi sukhaviśeṣajanakatā karuṇarasādiṣu tu sthāyinaḥ śokāder duḥkhajanakatayā prasiddhasya katham iva
GK16jgrasg1u:371: na ca satyasya śokāder duḥkhajanakatvaṃ kḷptaṃ na kalpitasyeti nāyakānām eva duḥkham,
GK16jgrasg1u:374: sahṛdaye rater api kalpitatvena sukhajanakatānupapatteś ceti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:376_0: śṛṅgārapradhānakāvyebhya iva karuṇapradhānakāvyebhyo 'pi yadi kevalāhlāda eva sahṛdayahṛdayapramāṇakas
GK16jgrasg1u:377: atha yady āhlāda iva duḥkham api pramāṇasiddhaṃ tadā pratibandhakatvaṃ na kalpanīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:384: iṣṭasyādhikyād aniṣṭasya ca nyūnatvāc candanadravalepanādāv iva pravṛtter upapatteḥ/

GK16jgrasg1u:400: cānabhyupagame 'pi prāguktadoṣamahimnā svātmani duṣyantāditādātmyāvagāhī śakuntalādiviṣayakaratyādimadabhedabodho mānasaḥ vilakṣaṇaviṣayitāśālī rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:401: svāpnādis tu tādṛśabodho na kāvyārthacintanajanmeti na rasaḥ/

GK16jgrasg1u:413: tatra “rater viśeṣaṇībhūtāyāḥ śabdād apratītatvād vyañjanāyāś ca tatpratyāyikāyā anabhyupagamāc ceṣṭādiliṅgakam ādau viśeṣaṇajñānārtham anumānam abhyupeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:414: (5) “mukhyatayā duṣyantādigata eva raso ratyādiḥ kamanīyavibhāvādyabhinayapradarśanakovide duṣyantādyanukartari naṭe samāropya sākṣātkriyate” ity eke/

GK16jgrasg1u:416_1: apy akṛtrimatayā gṛhītair bhinne viṣaye 'numitisāmagryā balavattvād anumīyamāno rasaḥ” ity apare /

GK16jgrasg1u:426: “vibhāvādīnāṃ saṃyogāj jñānād rasasya jñānaviśeṣātmano niṣpattir utpattiḥ” iti caturthe/

GK16jgrasg1u:429: “vibhāvādīnāṃ trayāṇāṃ saṃyogāt samudāyād rasaniṣpattī rasapadavyavahāraḥ” iti saptame/

GK16jgrasg1u:433: evaṃ ca prāmāṇike militānāṃ vyañjakatve yatra kvacid ekasmād evāsādhāraṇād rasodbodhas tatretaradvayam ākṣepyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:436: śemuṣībhir nānārūpatayāvasito 'pi manīṣibhiḥ paramāhlādāvinābhāvitayā pratīyamānaḥ prapañce 'smin raso ramaṇīyatām āvahatīti nirvivādam/
GK16jgrasg1u:439: hāsyo bhayānakaś caiva bībhatsaś ceti te nava//“
GK16jgrasg1u:444: aṣṭāv eva rasā nāṭye na śāntas tatra yujyate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:445: ity āhuḥ/ tac cāpare na kṣamante/
GK16jgrasg1u:446: tathā hi-- naṭe śamābhāvād iti hetur asaṃgataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:449: na ca naṭasya śamābhāvāt tadabhinayaprakāśakatvānupapattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:450: tasya bhayakrodhāder apy abhāvena tadabhinayaprakāśakatāyā apy asaṃgatyāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:451: yadi ca naṭasya krodhāder abhāvena vāstavatatkāryāṇāṃ vadhabandhādīnām utpattyasaṃbhave 'pi kṛtrimatatkāryāṇāṃ śikṣābhyāsādita utpattau nāsti bādhakam iti nirīkṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:453: atha nāṭye gītavādyādīnāṃ virodhināṃ sattvāt sāmājikeṣv api viṣayavaimukhyātmanaḥ śāntasya katham udreka iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:454: nāṭye śāntarasam abhyupagacchadbhiḥ phalabalāt tadgītavādyādes tasmin virodhitāyā akalpanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:455: viṣayacintāsāmānyasya tatra virodhitvasvīkāre tadīyālambanasya saṃsārānītyatvasya taduddīpanasya purāṇaśravaṇasatsaṅgapuṇyavanatīrthāvalokanāder api viṣayatvena virodhitvāpatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:457: “aṣṭāv eva rasā nāṭyeṣv iti kecid acūcudan/
GK16jgrasg1u:458: tadacāru yataḥ kaṃcin na rasaṃ svadate naṭaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:460: yair api nāṭye śānto raso nāstīty abhyupagamyate tair api bādhakābhāvān mahābhāratādiprabandhānāṃ śāntarasapradhānatayā akhilalokānubhavasiddhatvāc ca kāvye so 'vaśyaṃ svīkāryaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:461: atra eva “aṣṭau nāṭye rasāḥ smṛtāḥ” ity upakramya “śānto 'pi navamo rasaḥ” iti mammaṭabhaṭṭā apy upasamahārṣuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:464: hāso bhayaṃ jugupsā ca sthāyibhāvāḥ kramād amī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:465: rasebhyaḥ sthāyibhāvānāṃ ghaṭāder ghaṭādyavacchinnākāśād iva prathamadvitīyayor matayoḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:469: tatra ā prabandhaṃ sthiratvād amīṣāṃ bhāvānāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:471: na ca cittavṛttirūpāṇām eṣām āśuvināśitvena sthiratvaṃ durlabham,
GK16jgrasg1u:472: vāsanārūpatayā sthiratvaṃ tu vyabhicāriṣv atiprasaktam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:473: vāsanārūpāṇām amīṣāṃ muhurmuhur abhivyakter eva sthirapadārthatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:477: “virūddhair aviruddhair vā bhāvair vicchidyate na yaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:480: rasatvaṃ ye prapadyante prasiddhāḥ sthāyino 'tra te//“
GK16jgrasg1u:486: yāvad rasaṃ vartamānaḥ sthāyibhāva udāhṛtaḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:493: stokaṃ vibhāvair utpannās ta eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:498: yadā tu pradhānaparipoṣārthaṃ so 'pi bahuvibhāvajaḥ kriyate tadā tu rasālaṃkāra ityādi bodhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:500: strīpuṃsayor anyonyālambanaḥ premākhyaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo ratiḥ sthāyibhāvaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:503: strīpuṃsayos tu viyoge jīvitatvajñānadaśāyāṃ vaiklavyapoṣitāyā rater eva prādhānyāc chṛṅgāro vipralambhākhyo rasaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:505: mṛtatvajñānadaśāyāṃ tu ratipoṣitasya vaiklavyasyeti karuṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:506: yadā tu saty api mṛtatvajñāne devatāprasādādinā punar ujjīvanajñānaṃ kathaṃcit syāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:510: kecit tu rasāntaram evātra karuṇavipralambhākhyam icchanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:521: paramānarthaviṣayakatvābhāve tu sa eva trāso vyabhicāri/
GK16jgrasg1u:523: svāparādhadvārotthaṃ bhayam iti bhayatrāsayor bhedam āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:525: evam eṣāṃ sthāyibhāvānāṃ loke tattannāyakagatānāṃ yānyālambanatayoddīpanatayā vā kāraṇatvena prasiddhāni tāny eṣu kāvyanāṭyayor vyajyamāneṣu vibhāvaśabdena vyapadiśyante//
GK16jgrasg1u:546: evaṃ yasyāś cittavṛtter yo viṣayaḥ sa tasyā ālambanam/
GK16jgrasg1u:558: tatrādyo yathā “śayitā savidhe 'pyanīśvarā” ity atra nirūpitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:563: na hi guṇībhūtasya ratyāde rasadhvanivyapadeśahetutvaṃ yuktam/
GK16jgrasg1u:569: bālā lolavilocanā śiva śiva prāṇeśam ālokate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:577: śvāso dīrghas tadavādhi mukhe pāṇḍimā gaṇḍayugme
GK16jgrasg1u:581: āliṅgitāpi joṣaṃ tasthau sā gantukena dayitena//“
GK16jgrasg1u:583: imaṃ ca pañcavidhaṃ prāñcaḥ pravāsādibhir upādhibhir āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:584: te ca pravāsābhilāṣaviraherṣyāśāpānāṃ viśeṣānupalambhān nāsmābhiḥ prapañcitāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:587: hā tanaya vinayaśālin katham iva paralokapathiko 'bhūḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:594: śvapanātmabhuvor nirantarā mama jātā paramātmani sthitiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:598: yady api prathamārdhe uttamādhamayor upakramā dvitīyārdhe 'dhamottamavacanaṃ kramabhaṅgam āvahati,
GK16jgrasg1u:599: tathāpi vaktur brahmātmakatayottamādhamajñānavaikalyaṃ saṃpannam iti dyotanāya kramabhaṅgo guṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:605: atrāpi yady api viṣayagaṇālambanaḥ surasrotasvinītaṭādyuddīpito nayananimīlanādibhir anubhāvitaḥ sthāyi nirvedaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:606: bhagavadvāsudevālambanāyāṃ kaviratau guṇībhūta iti na śāntarasadhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:607: idaṃ ca padyaṃ mannirmitāyāṃ bhagavadbhaktipradhānāyāṃ karuṇālaharyām upanibaddham iti tatpradhānabhāvaprādhānyam evārhati/
GK16jgrasg1u:608: śāntarasānanuguṇaś cāyam ojasvī gumpha iti cānudāhāryam evaitat/
GK16jgrasg1u:609: pūrvapadye tu “paramātmani sthitiḥ” ity anena tattādrūpyāvagamād rater apratipattiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:623: vṛttir apy atra mahoddhatā raudrasya paramaujasvitāṃ paripuṣṇāti/
GK16jgrasg1u:624_0: anyatra gurusmaraṇe saty ahaṃbhāvavigamasyāvaśyakatayā prakṛte cājahatsvārthalakṣaṇāmūladhvananena
GK16jgrasg1u:624_1: madīyety anena garvotkarṣasyaiva prakāśanāt sphuṭaṃ gamyamānena vivekaśunyatvena
GK16jgrasg1u:631: tathāpy asau tatprabhāvavarṇanabījabhūtāyāṃ kaviratau guṇībhūta iti na raudrarasadhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:632: kāvyaprakāśagataraudrarasodāharaṇe tu “kṛtam anumataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vā yair idaṃ gurupātakam” iti padye raudrarasavyajanakṣamā nāsti vṛttiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:641: eṣā dvijaveṣāyendrāya kavacakuṇḍaladānodyatasya karṇasya taddānavismitān sabhyān pratyuktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:645: me ity arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyadhvanyutthāpito garvaḥ svakīyalokottarapitṛjanyatvādismṛtiś ca saṃcāriṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:647: tathā hi--utsāhapoṣakaṃ kavacakuṇḍalārpaṇayor laghutvanirūpaṇaṃ vidhātuṃ pūrvārdhe tadanukūlaśithilabandhātmikā/
GK16jgrasg1u:649: tataḥ paraṃ brāhmaṇe savinayatvaṃ prakāśayituṃ tanmūlībhūtaṃ garvarāhityaṃ dhvanayituṃ punaḥ śithilaiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:659: asūyādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiḥ paripoṣito 'pi kāmagavīgata utsāho rājastutiguṇībhūta iti na rasavyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:662: sarvāṃ dyām api susmitena hariṇā mandaṃ samālokitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:669: prāg anyagatasyeva prakṛte rājagatasyāpi tasya rājastutyutkarṣakatvāt/ etena
GK16jgrasg1u:672: nanu “akaruṇam avakṛtya-” ity atrāpi pratīyamānasya dānavīrasya karṇastutyaṅgatvāt kathaṃ dhvanitvam iti cet, satyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:675: karṇasya ca mahāśayatvenātmastutau tātparyānupapatteḥ stutir avākyārtha eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:676: paraṃ tu vīrarasapratyayānantaraṃ tādṛśotsāhena liṅgena svādhikaraṇe sānumīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:677: rājavarṇanapadye tu rājastutau tātparyād vākyārthataiva tasyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:679: “na kapota bhavantam aṇv api spṛśatu śyena samudbhavaṃ bhayam/
GK16jgrasg1u:680: idam adya mayā tṛṇīkṛtaṃ bhavadāyuḥkuśalaṃ kalevaram//“
GK16jgrasg1u:682: “na kapotakapotakaṃ tava spṛśatu śyena manāg api spṛhā/
GK16jgrasg1u:683: idam adya mayā samarpitaṃ bhavate cārutaraṃ kalevaram//“
GK16jgrasg1u:684: eṣā śiveḥ kapotaṃ śyenaṃ prati coktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:688: na cātra śarīradānapratyayād dānavīradhvanitvāpattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:693: prabhāvaprāgalbhyaṃ tvayi tu mama ko 'yaṃ parikaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:701: vṛttir atra devānāṃ prastāve tadgatakātaryaprakāśanadvārā vīrarasānālambanatvāvagataye 'nuddhataiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:703: tasyāvajñayā rāmagatotsāhānālambanatvena tadālambanasya rasasyāpratyayān na prakarṣavatī/
GK16jgrasg1u:704: bhagavato bhavasya tu paramottamālambanavibhāvatvāt tatprastāve tadālambanasyaujasvino vīrarasasya niṣpatteḥ prakṛṣṭoddhatā/
GK16jgrasg1u:706: “sapadi vilayam etu rājyalakṣmīr upari patantv athavā kṛpāṇadhārāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:707: apaharatutarāṃ śiraḥ kṛtānto mama tu matir na manāg apaiti dharmāt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:708: eṣādharmeṇāpi ripur jetavya iti vadantaṃ prati yudhiṣṭhirasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:710: “na jātu kāmān na bhayān na lobhād dharmaṃ tyajej jīvītasyāpi hetoḥ” ity ādivākyālocanam uddīpanam/
GK16jgrasg1u:713: itthaṃ vīrarasasya cāturvidhyaṃ prapañcitaṃ prācām anurodhāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:714: vastutas tu bahavo vīrarasasya śṛṅgārasyeva prakārā nirūpayituṃ śakyante/
GK16jgrasg1u:715: tathā hi--prācīna eva “sapadi vilayam etu” ityādi padye “mama tu matir na manāg apaiti satyāt” iti caramapādavyatyāsena padyāntaratāṃ prāpite satyavīrasyāpi saṃbhavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:716: na ca satyasyāpi dharmāntargatatayā dharmavīrarasa eva tadvīrasyāpy antarbhāva iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:717: dānadayayor api tadantargatatayā tadvīrayor api dharmavīrāt pṛthaggaṇanānaucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:720: “api vakti girāṃ patiḥ svayaṃ yadi tāsām adhidevatāpi vā/
GK16jgrasg1u:722: atra bṛhaspatyādyālambanaḥ sabhādidarśanoddīpito nikhilavidvattiraskārānubhāvito garveṇa saṃcāriṇā poṣita utsāho vaktuḥ pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:727: api bahaladahanajālaṃ mūrdhni ripur me nirantaraṃ dhamatu/
GK16jgrasg1u:728: pātayatu vāsidhārām aham aṇumātraṃ na kiṃcid ābhāṣe//“
GK16jgrasg1u:732: “pariharatu dharāṃ phaṇipravīraḥ sukhamayatāṃ kamaṭho 'pi tāṃ vihāya/“
GK16jgrasg1u:733: aham iha puruhūta pakṣakoṇe nikhilam idaṃ jagad aklamaṃ vahāmi//
GK16jgrasg1u:735: nanu “api vakti-“pariharatu dharām-” iti padyadvaye garva eva notsāhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:736: madhyasthapadye tu dhṛtir eva dhvanyate iti bhāvadhvanaya evaite na rasadhvanaya iti cet tarhi yuddhavīrādiṣv api garvādidhvanitām eva kiṃ na brūyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:737: rasadhvanisāmānyam eva vā kiṃ na tadvyabhicāradhvananena gatārthayeḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:744: kadācid bhagavato vāsudevasya vadanam ālokitavatyā yaśodāyā iyam uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:752: pratītāyāṃ vā tasyāṃ vismayasya guṇatvaṃ na yujyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:753: evaṃ kaścin mahāpuruṣo 'yam iti bhaktir api tasyāḥ mamāyaṃ bāla iti niścayena pratibandhād utpattam eva neṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:754: atas tasyām api vismayasya guṇībhāvo na śaṅkyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:759: lokottaraṃ dhairyam aho prabhāvaḥ kāpy ākṛtir nūtana eṣa sargaḥ// iti,
GK16jgrasg1u:760: tatredaṃ vaktavyam-- pratīyatāṃ nāmātra vismayaḥ paraṃ tv asau kathaṃkāraṃ adbhutarasa] dhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:762: yathā mahābhārate gītāsu viśvarūpaṃ dṛṣṭavataḥ pārthasya “paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān” ity ādau vākyasaṃdarbhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:764: bhaktir naivātra pratīyata iti ced daramukulitalocanaṃ vidāṃkurvantu sahṛdayāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:767: aṅgaṃ gavāṃ pūrvam aho pavitraṃ na vā kathaṃ rāsabhadharmapatnyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:776: uttamānāṃ madhyamānāṃ nīcānām apy asau bhavet/
GK16jgrasg1u:777: tryavasthaḥ kathitas tasya ṣaḍbhedāḥ santi cāpare//
GK16jgrasg1u:778: smitaṃ ca hasitaṃ proktam uttame puruṣe budhaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:786: ākuñcitākṣi mandraṃ ca vidur vihasitaṃ budhāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:795: kampamānatanur ākulekṣaṇāḥ spandituṃ na hi śaśāka lāvakaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:807: nanu ratikrodhotsāhabhayaśokavismayanirvedeṣu prāg udāhṛteṣu yathālambanāśrayayoḥ saṃpratyayaḥ na tathā hāse jugupsāyāṃ ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:809: padyaśrotuś ca rasāsvādādhikaraṇatvena laukikahāsajugupsāśrayatvānupapatter iti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:812: tadanākṣepe tu śrotuḥ svīyakāntāvarṇanapadyād iva rasodbodhe bādhakābhāvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:814: eṣāṃ prādhānye dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam guṇībhāve tu rasālaṃkāratvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:815: kecit tu “prādhānya evaiṣāṃ rasatvam anyathālaṃkāratvam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:820: ete cāsaṃlakṣyakramavyaṅgyāḥ sahṛdayena rasavyaktau jhagiti jāyamānāyāṃ vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārivimarśakramasya sato 'pi sūcīśatapattraśatavedhakramasyevālakṣaṇāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:824: bhagavadālambanasya romāñcāśrupātādibhir anubhāvitasya harṣādibhiḥ paripoṣitasya bhāgavatādipurāṇaśravaṇasamaye bhagavadbhaktair
GK16jgrasg1u:833: na ca tarhi kāminīviṣayāyā api rater bhāvatvam astu,
GK16jgrasg1u:836: kāminyādiratīnāṃ ca bhāvatvam vinigamakābhāvāt, iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:838: anyathā putrādiviṣayāyā api rateḥ sthāyibhāvatvaṃ kuto na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:839: na syād vā kutaḥ śuddhabhāvatvaṃ jugupsāśokādīnām ity akhiladarśanaṃ vyākulī syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:852: atra kavinā prakṛtarasaṃ paripoṣṭukāmena tadabhivyañjake kāvye tadviruddharasāṅgānāṃ nibandhanaṃ na kāryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:853: yathā hi sati tadabhivyaktau viruddhaḥ prakṛtaṃ bādheta/
GK16jgrasg1u:855: yadi tu viruddhayor api rasayor ekatra samāveśa iṣyate tadā virodhaṃ parihṛtya vidheyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:861: yathā nāyakagatatvena vīrarase varṇanīye pratināyake bhayānakasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:869: yathā mannirmitāyām ākhyāyikāyāṃ kaṇvāśramagatasya śvetaketor maharṣeḥ śāntarasapradhāne varṇane prastute “kim idam anākalitapūrvaṃ rūpam,
GK16jgrasg1u:870: ko 'yam anirvācyo vacanaracanāyā madhurimā” ity adbhutasyāntaravasthāpanena varavarṇinīṃ pratyanurāgavarṇane/
GK16jgrasg1u:874: atra surāṅganāmṛtaśarīrālambanayoḥ śṛṅgārabībhatsayor antaḥ svargalābhākṣipto vīraraso niveśitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:876: tac ca prakṛtapadye prathamārdha eva śṛṅgāracarvaṇottaraṃ vīrasya carvaṇād anantaraṃ ca dvitīyārdhe bībhatsasyeti sphuṭam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:878: vivekaḥ/ itthaṃ codāsīnacarvaṇena pratibandhakajñānanivṛttau niṣpratyūhaḥ pratibadhyacarvaṇodaya iti phalito 'rthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:880: aṅginy anyasminn aṅgayor vā na virodhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:883: pratyudgatā savinayaṃ sahasā sakhībhiḥ smeraiḥ smarasya sacivaiḥ sarasāvalokaiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:884: mām adya mañjuracanair vacanaiś ca bāle hā leśato 'pi na kathaṃ vada satkaroṣi//
GK16jgrasg1u:885: iyaṃ ca puro nipatitāṃ pramītāṃ nāyikāṃ prati nāyakasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:887: aśrupātādibhir anubhāvair āvegaviṣādādibhiḥ saṃcāribhiś ca vyajyamānā nāyakagatā ratis tulyasāmagryabhivyakte prakṛtatvāt pradhānībhūte tadgata eva śoke prakarṣakatvād aṅgam/
GK16jgrasg1u:888: yadi tu nāyakagatā ratir nātra pratīyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:889: kiṃ tu niruktasāmagryā śoka eva prakṛtatvād ity āgṛhyate tadā nāyakālambanā pratyudgamādyanubhāvitā harṣādibhiḥ poṣitā nāyikāśrayā ratir eva tatrāṅgam astu/
GK16jgrasg1u:891: na ca nāyikāyā nāśāt tadgatāyā rater asaṃnidhānāt katham aṅgateti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:898: yāntīnāṃ gahaneṣu kaṇṭakacitāḥ ke ke na bhūmīruhāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:899: atra samāsoktyavayavābhyāṃ tarukāmikartṛkaripukāminīkabaryādigrahaṇarūpābhyāṃ prakṛtāprakṛtavyavahārābhyāṃ vyaktayoḥ karuṇaśṛṅgārayo rājaviṣayakaratibhāvāṅgatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:900: kiṃ ca prakṛtarasaparipuṣṭim icchatā virodhino 'pi rasasya bādhyatvena nibandhanaṃ kāryam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:901: tathā hi sati vairivijayakṛtā varṇyasya kāpi śobhā saṃpadyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:902: bādhyatvaṃ ca rasasya prabalair virodhino rasasyāṅgair vidyamāneṣv api svāṅgeṣu niṣpitteḥ pratibandhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:906: na ca virodhyaṅgābhivyatyā pratibandhān nābhivyaktir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:910: rasaniṣpatteḥ pratibandhas tv anubhavasiddha iti tāṃ praty eva virodhyaṅgānāṃ balavatām abhivyakteḥ pratibandhakatvaṃ nyāyyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:911: api ca yatra sādhāraṇaviśeṣaṇamahimnā viruddhayor abhivyaktis tatrāpi virodho nivartate/
GK16jgrasg1u:915: ittham avirodhasaṃpādanenāpi nibadhyamāno raso rasaśabdena śṛṅgārādiśabdair vā nābhidhātum ucitaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:918: yatra vibhāvādibhir abhivyaktasya rasasya svaśabdenābhidhānaṃ tatra ko doṣa iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:920: āsvādyatāvacchedakarūpeṇa pratyayājanakatayā rasasthale vācyavṛtteḥ kāpeyakalpatvena viśeṣadoṣatvāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:922: evaṃ vibhāvānubhāvayor asamyakpratyaye vilambena pratyaye vā na rasāsvāda iti tayor doṣatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:923: samabalaprabalapratikūlarasāṅgānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tu prakṛtarasapoṣaprātīpikam iti doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:924: prabandhe prakṛtasya prasaṅgāntareṇa vicchinnasya punardīpane sāmājikānāṃ na sāmagryeṇa rasāsvāda iti vicchinnadīpanaṃ doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:927: yathā sandhyāvandanadevayajanādidharmavarṇane prasakte kayāpi kāminyā saha kasyacitkāmukasyānurāgavarṇane/
GK16jgrasg1u:928: yathā ca samupasthiteṣu mahāhavadurmadeṣu pratibhaṭeṣu marmabhindi vacanāny udgiratsu nāyakasya saṃdhyāvandanādivarṇane cety ubhayam anucitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:929: evam apradhānasya pratināyakāder nānāvidhānāṃ caritānām anekavidhāyāś ca saṃpado nāyakasambandhibhyas tebhyo nātiśayo varṇanīyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:930: yathā sati varṇayitumiṣṭo nāyakasyotkarṣo na siddhyet/
GK16jgrasg1u:932: na ca pratināyakotkarṣasya tadabhibhāvakanāyakotkarṣāṅgatvāt katham avarṇanīyatvam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:935: na ca pratipakṣasya prakṛtāpekṣayā varṇyamāno 'py utkarṣaḥ svāśrayahantṛtāmātrād eva prakṛtagatam utkarṣam atiśāyayet,
GK16jgrasg1u:937: evaṃ hi sati mahārājaṃ kam api viṣaśarakṣepamātreṇa vyāpāditavato varākasya śabarasyeva prakṛtasya nāyakasya na ko 'py utkarṣaḥ syād iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:938: tathā rasālambanāśrayayor anusaṃdhānam antarāntarā viratā na ced, doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:939: tadanusaṃdhānādhīnā hi rasapratipattidhārā tadananusaṃdhāne viratā syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:940: evaṃ prakṛtarasānupakārakasya vastuno varṇanam api prakṛtarasavirāmahetutvād doṣa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:943: tac ca jātideśakālavarṇāśramavayovasthāprakṛtivyavahārādeḥ prapañcajātasya tasya yasya yallokaśāstrasiddham ucitadravyaguṇakriyādi, tadbhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:962: tatra ratyādīnāṃ bhayātiriktasthāyibhāvānāṃ sarvatra samatve 'pi rateḥ saṃbhogarupāyā manuṣyeṣv ivottamadevatāsu sphuṭīkṛtasakalānubhāvavarṇanam anucitam/
GK16jgrasg1u:963: krodhasya ca lokabhasmīkaraṇapaṭor dinarātrivyatyayādyanekāścaryakāriṇo divyeṣv ivādivyeṣu/
GK16jgrasg1u:965: na ca sādhāraṇīkaraṇād ārādhyatvajñānānutpattir iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:966: yatra sahṛdayānāṃ rasodbodhaḥ pramāṇasiddhas tatraiva sādhāraṇīkaraṇasya kalpanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:968: jayadevādibhis tu gītagovindādiprabandheṣu sakalasahṛdayasaṃmato'yaṃ samayo madonmattamataṅgajair iva bhinna iti ca tannidarśanenedānīṃtanena tathā varṇayituṃ sāṃpratam/
GK16jgrasg1u:969: tathā vidyāvayovarṇāśramatapobhir utkṛṣṭaiḥ svato 'pakṛṣṭeṣu na sabahumānena vacasā vyavahartavyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:971: tatrāpi tatrabhavan bhagavann ityādibhiḥ saṃbodhanair munigurudevatāprabhṛtaya eva na rājādayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:979: yāvatā tv anaucityena rasasya puṣṭis tāvat tu na vāryate,
GK16jgrasg1u:983: svalpaṃ jalpa bṛhaspate jaḍamate naiṣā sabhā vajriṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:984: vīṇāṃ saṃhara nārada stutikathālāpair alaṃ tumburo
GK16jgrasg1u:986: iti kasyacin nāṭakasya padye vipralambhaśṛṅgārāṅgībhūtavīrarasākṣepakaparamaiśvaryaparipoṣakatayā sthitadauvārikavacanasya brahmādyadhikṣepaparasyānaucityaṃ na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:987: evam eva “ale le saddaḥsamuppāḍia hariyakusaggaṃthimayācchamālāpai vittivissambhia bālavihavaṃdaḥkaaṇā bamhaṇā” ity ādividūṣakavacane 'pi reśabdādiprayogasya tattathā,
GK16jgrasg1u:991: raseṣu caiteṣu nigaditeṣu mādhuryaujaḥprasādākhyāṃs trīn guṇān āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:996: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇaśāntayos tābhyām api vipralambhe” ity apare/
GK16jgrasg1u:997: saṃyogaśṛṅgārāt karuṇavipralambhaśānteṣv atiśayitam eva na punas tatrāpi tāratamyam” ity anye/
GK16jgrasg1u:998: tatra prathamacaramayor matayoḥ “karuṇe vipralambhe tacchānte cātiśayānvitam” iti prācāṃ sūtram anukūlam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1000: madhyasthe tu mate karuṇaśāntābhyāṃ vipralambhasya mādhuryātiśaye yadi sahṛdayānām anubhavo 'sti sākṣī tadā sa pramāṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1005: prasādas tu sarveṣu raseṣu sarvāsu racanāsu ca sādhāraṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1006: guṇānāṃ caiṣāṃ drutidīptivikāsākhyās tisraś cittavṛttayaḥ krameṇa prayojyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1010: ojasvī bandha ity ādayo vyavahārā ākāro 'sya śūra ity ādivyavahāravad aupacārikā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1011: ye 'mī mādhuryaujaḥ prasādārasamātradharmatayoktās teṣāṃ rasadharmatve kiṃ mānam?
GK16jgrasg1u:1013: dāhādeḥ kāryād analagatasyoṣṇasparśasya yathā bhinnatayānubhavas tathā drutyādicittavṛttibhyo rasakāryebhyo 'nyeṣāṃ rasagataguṇānām ananubhavāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1014: tādṛśaguṇaviśiṣṭarasānāṃ drutyādikāraṇatvāt kāraṇatāvacchedakatayā guṇānām anumānam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1017: prātisvikarūpeṇa kāraṇatvakalpanāpekṣayā laghubhūtam iti tu na vācyam/ pareṇa
GK16jgrasg1u:1018: madhuratarādiguṇānāṃ pṛthag drutataratvādi kāryatāratamyaprayojakatayābhyupagamena mādhuryavattvena kāraṇatāyā gaḍubhūtatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1024: atha śṛṅgāro madhura ity ādivyavahāraḥ katham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1026: prayojakatāsaṃbandhena drutyādikam eva vā mādhuryādikam astu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1030: tathā ca śabdārthayor api mādhuryāder īdṛśasya sattvād upacāro naiva kalpya iti tu mādṛśāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1039: śabdānāṃ bhinnānām apy ekatvapratibhānaprayojakaḥ saṃhitayaikajātīyavarṇavinyāsaviśeṣo gāḍhatvāparaparyāyaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1058: yadi komalatā tavāṅgakānām atha kā nāma kathāpi pallavānām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1062: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1074: udāharanti ca “svacaraṇaviniviṣṭair nūpurair nartakīnāṃ jhaṭiti raṇitam āsīt” ityādi/
GK16jgrasg1u:1075: tatra teṣām etādṛśīṃ vikaṭatvalakṣaṇām udāratām ojasy
GK16jgrasg1u:1076: antarbhāvayan kāvyaprakāśakāraḥ katham anukūla iti ta eva jānanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1077: na hy atraujaso vaipulyena pratibhānam asti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1078: “viniviṣṭair nūpurair narta-” ity atra sannapy ojaso lavo na camatkārī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1079: nāpi tatra nṛtyatprāyatvaṃ varṇānām anubhavanti sahṛdayāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1087: yathā vā “ayaṃ patatu nirdayam” ityādiprāg udāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:1088: avidagdhavaidikādiprayogayogyānāṃ padānāṃ parihāreṇa prayujyamāneṣu padeṣu lokottaraśobhārūpam aujjvalyaṃ kāntiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1092: krama eva hi tayoḥ prasādād asya bhedakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1099: gaṅgety ādau mādhuryasya vyañjakeṣu varṇeṣu satsv api dīrghasamāsāntaḥpātitayāna tasya prarohaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1102: evaṃ kriyāparamparayā vidagdhaceṣṭitasya tadasphuṭatvasya tadupapādakayukteś ca sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpaḥ saṃsargaḥ śleṣaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1109: hariṃ sarvatra paśyāmi harer anyan na bhāti me//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1110: atra viṣṇur bhrātety ādinirmāṇe prakramabhaṅgātmakaṃ vaiṣamyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1111: ekasyā evokter bhaṅgyantareṇa punaḥ kathanātmakam uktivaicitryaṃ mādhuryam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1114: sukhaṃ śeṣe śetāṃ harir avīrataṃ nṛtyatu haraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1116: savitrī kāmānāṃ yadi jagati jāgarti bhavatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1117: atra vidhyādibhir nāsti kim api prayojanam ity eṣo 'rthaḥ samādhividhānādipreraṇārūpeṇoktivaicitryeṇābhihitaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1121: “priyāmaraṇakātaraḥ” ity atra tu śokadāyino maraṇaśabdasya sattvāt pāruṣyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1128: “cumbanaṃ dehi me bhārye kāmacāṇḍālatṛptaye” ity ādigrāmyārthaparihāra udāratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1136: prauḍhir vyāsasamāsau ca sābhiprāyatvam asya ca// iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1137: pūrvārdhapratipādyaṃ dvayaṃ vyāsasamāsau ceti catuṣprakārā prauḍhiḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1138: sābhiprāyatvaṃ ceti pañcaprakāram oja ity arthaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1149: atra “yasyāḥ parāṅganāgehāt patiḥ prātargṛhe 'ñcati” iti vākyārthe khaṇḍitāpadābhidhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1150: “ayācitaḥ sukhaṃ datte yācitaś ca na yacchati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1151: sarvasvaṃ cāpi harate vidhir ucchṛṅkhalo nṛṇām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1152: atra daivādhīnaṃ sarvam ity ekasmin vākyārthe nānāvākyaracanātmako vyāsapadavācyo vistaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1159: “tataś ca mukto 'bhūd” iti vākyārthakalāpaḥ śatṛ-ktvā-bahuvrīhibhis tiṅantena cānuvādyavidheyabhāvenaikavākyārthīkṛtaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1165: pāpiṣṭhavāt karuṇāyā abhāve prakṛte 'syāḥ saṃpādanāya gaṇikety ādi sīdann iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1170: avarṇitapūrvo 'yam arthaḥ pūrvavarṇitacchāyo veti kaver ālocanaṃ samādhiḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1174: apare tv eṣu guṇeṣu katipayān prāguktais tribhir guṇair vakṣyamāṇadoṣābhāvālaṃkāraiś ca gatārthayantaḥ kāṃścid vaicitryamātrarūpatayā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1175: kvacid doṣatayā ca manyamānā na tāvataḥ svīkurvanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1177: na ca śleṣodāratayoḥ sarvāṃśe gāḍhabandhātmanor ojovyañjakaghaṭanāntarbhāvo 'stu nāma,
GK16jgrasg1u:1179: gāḍhaśithilātmanor aṃśenaujovyañjakāntarbhāve 'py aṃśāntareṇa kutrāntarbhāva iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1182: evaṃ ca sarvatra vyañjake vyaṅgyaśabdaprayogo bhāktaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1187: kāvyaṃ tarhi sakhe sukhena kathaya tvaṃ saṃmukhe mādṛśāṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1188: no ced duṣkṛtam ātmanā kṛtam iva svāntād bahir mā kṛthāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1189: atra pūrvārdhe tṛtīyacaraṇe ca lokottaranirmāṇapratipādake yo mārgo na sa caturthacaraṇe kadaryakāvyapratipādaka iti vaiṣamyam eva guṇaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1192: arthaguṇeṣv api-- śleṣaḥ ojasa ādyāś catvāro bhedāś ca uktivaicitryamātrarūpā iti na guṇāntarbhāvam arhanti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1202_1: doṣāṇāṃ nirākaraṇena svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasya rasadhvanirasavadalaṃkārayoś ca svīkaraṇena ca gatārthāni /
GK16jgrasg1u:1203: samādhis tu kavigataḥ kāvyasya kāraṇaṃ na tu guṇaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1205: atas traya eva guṇā iti mammaṭabhaṭṭādayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1206: tatra ṭavargavarjitānāṃ vargāṇāṃ prathamatṛtīyaiḥ śarbhir antasthaiś ca ghaṭitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1207: naikaṭyena prayuktair anusvāraparasavarṇāiḥ śuddhānunāsikaiś ca śobhitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1208: vakṣyamāṇaiḥ sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca niṣiddhaiḥ saṃyogādyair acumbitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1215: anye tu vargasthānāṃ pañcānām apy aviśeṣeṇa mādhuryavyañjakatām āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1218: svānta me kalaya śāntaye ciraṃ naicikīnayanacumbitāṃ śriyam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1221: ānandam aṅkurayati smaraṇena kāpi ramyā daśā manasi me madirekṣaṇāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1222: prathame padye 'tiśayoktyalaṃkṛtasya bhagavaddhyānautsukyasya bhagavadviṣayakarater vā dhvanyamānāyāḥ śānta eva paryavasānāt tadgatamādhuryasyābhivyañjikā racaneyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1225: asmin patitāḥ prathamatṛtīyavargyā guṇasyāsya nānukūlā nāpi pratikūlāḥ saṃyogāghaṭakāś cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:1228: yathā-- “ayaṃ patatu nirdayaṃ dalitadṛpta-” ity ādau prāgudāhṛte/
GK16jgrasg1u:1229: śrutamātrā vākyārtham karatalabadaram iva nivedayantī ghaṭanā prasādasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1231: udāharaṇāny atra prāyaśo madīyāni sarvāṇy eva padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:1234: prāṇeśaḥ praṇayākulaḥ punar asāv āstāṃ samastā kathā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1235: etat tvāṃ vinivedayāmi mama ceduktiṃ hitāṃ manyase
GK16jgrasg1u:1236: mugdhe mā kuru mānam ānanam idaṃ rākāpatir jeṣyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1237: atra sarvāvacchedena prasādābhivyañjakatvam aṃśabhedena tu mādhuryaujobhivyañjakatvam api,
GK16jgrasg1u:1238: manasijāntasya mā kurv ādeś ca mādhuryābhivyaktihetutvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1240: nanv atra śṛṅgārāśrayasya mādhuryasyābhivyaktaye tadanukūlās tu nāma racanā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1241: ojasas tu kaḥ prasaṅgo yad arthaṃ tadanukūlavarṇavinyāsa iti cet/
GK16jgrasg1u:1242: nāyikāmānopaśāntaye kṛtānekayatnāyās tadīyaṃ hitam upadiśantyāḥ sakhyāḥ sakrodhatvasya vyañjanīyatayā tathāvinyāsasya sāphalyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1243: kiṃ bahunā rasasyaujasvino 'marṣāder bhāvasya cāvivakṣāyām api vaktari kruddhatayā prasiddhe vācye vā krūratare ākhyāyikādau prabandhe vā,
GK16jgrasg1u:1245: vācā nirmalayā sudhāmadhurayā yāṃ nātha śikṣāmadās
GK16jgrasg1u:1246: tāṃ svapne 'pi na saṃspṛśāmy aham ahaṃbhāvāvṛto nistrapaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1247: ity āgaḥśataśālinaṃ punar api svīyeṣu māṃ bibhratas
GK16jgrasg1u:1248: tvatto nāsti dayānidhir yadupate matto na mattaḥ paraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1250: tattadguṇavyañjanakṣamāyā nirmiteḥ paricayāya sāmānyato viśeṣataś ca varjanīyaṃ kiṃcin nirūpyate-- varṇānāṃ svānantaryaṃ sakṛdekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1257: yathā-- “śuka karoṣi kathaṃ vijane rucim” ity ādau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1260: evaṃ svasamānavargyānantaryaṃ sakṛd ekapadagatatve kiṃcid aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1265: yathā-- “atha tasya vacaḥ śrutvā” ity ādau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1268: etac ca vargāṇāṃ prathamadvitīyayos tṛtīyacaturthayor ānantaryam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1269: prathamatṛtīyayor dvitīyatṛtīyayor vānantaryaṃ tu tathā nāśrāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1271: etad apy asakṛc cet tato 'dhikatvāt sādhāraṇair api vedyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1281: “yathā yathā tāmarasāyatekṣaṇā mayā sarāgaṃ nitarāṃ niṣevitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1282: tathā tathā tattvakatheva sarvato vikṛṣya mām ekarasaṃ cakāra sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1287: idaṃ tu bodhyam-- gurur yayor vyavadhāyakas tayor eva varṇayor ānantaryakṛtam aśravyatvam apavadati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1291: “rāṣṭre tavoṣṭryaḥ paritaś caranti” ity evamādayaḥ śṛutikāṭavabhedā anye 'py anubhavānusāreṇa bodhyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1292: atha dīrghānantaryaṃ saṃyogasya bhinnapadagatasya sakṛd apy aśravyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1299: bhinnapadagatatvābhāvān madhuratvāc cānantaryaṃ na manāg apy aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1301: atra tām ity atra nīm ity atra ca parasavarṇasya pūrvapadabhaktatayā na saṃyogo bhinnapadagataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1302: pratyekaṃ saṃyogasaṃjñeti pakṣe 'pi bhinnapadagataḥ saṃyogo na dīrghād avyavahitaparaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1303_0: navāmbudety atra tv ekādeśasya padadvayabhaktatayā dīrghād bhinnapadagatatve saty
GK16jgrasg1u:1303_1: avyavahitottaratvaṃ yady api parasavarṇakṛtasaṃyogasya bhavati tathāpy atra bhinnapadagatatvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1305: yathā-- “eṣāṃ priyā me kva gatā trapākulā”/
GK16jgrasg1u:1306: idaṃ cāśravyatvaṃ kāvyasya paṅgutvam iva pratīyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1307: atha svecchayā saṃdhyakaraṇaṃ sakṛd apy aśravyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1311: evam eva ca ya-va-lopaprayuktam “apara iṣavaete kāminīnāṃ dṛgantāḥ”/
GK16jgrasg1u:1314: tārā iva turagā iva sukhalīnā mantriṇo bhavataḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1315: iti bhavadīyaṃ kāvyam iti ced akṛtvaiva yalopaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1317: evaṃ rorutvasya hali lopasya yaṇguṇavṛddhisavarṇadīrghapūrvarūpādīnāṃ naikaṭyena bāhulyam aśravyatāhetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1318: evam ime sarve 'py aśravyabhedāḥ kāvyasāmānye varjanīyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1320: tatra madhuraraseṣu ye viśeṣato varjanīyā anupadaṃ vakṣyante ta evaujasviṣv anukūlāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1321: ye cānukūlatayoktās te pratikūlā iti sāmānyato nirṇayaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1326: sāyāhani praṇayino bhavanaṃ vrajantyāś ceto na kasya harate gatir aṅganāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1329: vedhā vidhāya punar uktam ivendubimbaṃ dūrīkaroti na kathaṃ viduṣāṃ vareṇyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1332: uttarārdhe kakāratakārarūpajhaydvayasaṃyogasya sattve 'pi prācuryābhāvān na doṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1335: ity ādi kriyate tadā sarvam eva ramaṇīyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1341: “kalitakuliśaghātāẖ ke 'pi khelanti vātāḥ kuśalam iha kathaṃ vā jāyatāṃ jīvite me/
GK16jgrasg1u:1342: ayam api bata guñjannāli mākandamaulau culukayati madīyāṃ cetanāṃ cañcarīkaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1344: yadi ca “kathaya katham ivāśā jāyatāṃ jīvite me malayabhujagavāntā vānti vātāḥ kṛtāntāḥ” iti vidhīyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1348: capalopamitā khalu svayaṃ yā bata loke sukhasādhanaṃ kathaṃ sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1349: atra dvāv upadhmānīyāv eva na śāntānuguṇau/
GK16jgrasg1u:1351: “vacane tava yatra mādhurī sā hṛdi pūrṇā karuṇā ca komale 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1352: adhunā hariṇākṣi hā kathaṃ vā kaṭutā tatra kaṭhoratāvirāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1353: adhunā sakhi tatra hā kathaṃ vā gatir anyaiva vilokyate guṇānām” iti tv anuguṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1355: tulām anālokya nijām akharvaṃ gaurāṅgi garvaṃ na kadāpi kuryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1357: yadi tu “tulām anālokya mahītale 'smin” iti nirmīyate tathā sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1358: halāṃ la-ma-na-bhinnānāṃsvātmanā saṃyogasyāsakṛt prayogo yathā-- “vigaṇayya me nikāyyaṃ tām anuyāto 'si naiva tannyāyyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1359: ” la-ma-nānāṃ svātmanā saṃyogas tu na tathā pāruṣyam āvahati/yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:1360: “iyam ullasitā mukhasya śobhā pariphullaṃ nayanāmbujadvayaṃ te/
GK16jgrasg1u:1361: jaladālim ayaṃ jagadvitanvan kalitaḥ kvāpi kim āli nīlameghaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1363: “ā sāyaṃ salilabhare savitāram upāsya sādaraṃ tapasā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1364: adhunābjena manāk tava mānini tulanā mukhasyāptā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1366: “sarasijakulena saṃprati bhāmini te mukhatulādhigatā” iti tu sādhu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1368: ayi mandasmitamadhuraṃ vadanaṃ tanvaṅgi yadi manāk kuruṣe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1369: adhunaiva kalaya śamitaṃ rākāramaṇasya hanta sāmrājyam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1371_1: tṛtīyasaṃyogasya cāsaṃbhavāt savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyoganiṣedho niravakāśa iti cet, na /
GK16jgrasg1u:1379: yaṅalugantāny anyāni ca śābdikapriyāṇy api madhurarase na prayuñjīta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1380: evaṃ vyaṅgyacarvaṇātiriktayojanāviśeṣāpekṣānāpātato 'dhikacamatkāriṇo 'nuprāsanicayān yamakādīṃś ca saṃbhavato 'pi kavir na nibadhnīyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1381: yato hi te rasacarvaṇāyām anantarbhavantaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayaṃ svābhimukhaṃ vidadhānā rasaparāṅmukhaṃ vidadhīran/
GK16jgrasg1u:1383: yato madhuratamatvenāsya nirmalasitānirmitapānakarasasyeva tanīyān api svātantryam āvahan padārthaḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāruṃtudatayāna sarvathaiva sāmānādhikaraṇyam arhati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1387: ye tu punar akliṣṭatayānunnataskandhatayā ca na pṛthag bhāvanām apekṣante,
GK16jgrasg1u:1388: kiṃ tu rasacarvaṇāyām eva susukhaṃ gocarīkartuṃ śakyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1392: āli vidhāya sāyaṃ smerānanā sapadi śīlaya saudhamaulim/
GK16jgrasg1u:1393: prauḍhiṃ bhajantu kumudāni mudām udārām ullāsayantu parito harito mukhāni//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1394: ittham ete prasaṅgato madhurarasābhivyañjikāyāṃ racanāyāṃ saṃkṣepeṇa nirūpitā doṣāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1395: “ebhir viśeṣaviṣayaiḥ sāmānyair api ca dūṣaṇai rahitā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1398: tāṃ vibudhā vaidarbhīṃ vadanti vṛttiṃ gṛhītaparipākām//
GK16jgrasg1u:1399: asyām udāhṛtāny eva kiyanty api padyāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:1403: vāme mānam apākaroṣi na manāg adyāpi roṣeṇa te
GK16jgrasg1u:1404: hā hā bālamṛṇālato 'py atitamāṃ tanvī tanus tāmyati//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1405: asyāś ca rīter nirmāṇe kavinā nitarām avahitena bhāvyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1409: nidrāvyājam upāgatasya suciraṃ nirvarṇya patyur mukham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1411: lajjānamramukhī priyeṇa hasatā bālā ciraṃ cumbitā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1412: atrotthāya kiṃcicchanair ity atra savarṇajhaydvayasaṃyogas tatrāpi naikaṭyeneti sutarām aśravyaḥ/ evaṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:1415: nirvarṇya patyur mukham ity atra ca rephaghaṭitasaṃyogasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1421: lokateś ca dhātor dviḥ prayogaḥ kaver nirmāṇasāmagrīdāridryaṃ prakāśayati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1429: dvārāntaranirapekṣatvena vyañjakatve viśeṣite tv asaṃbhavaḥ prasajyeta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1432: ata eva ca vibhāvānubhāvabhinnatvasyeva śabdabhinnatvasyāpi tadviśeṣaṇatve na nistāraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1434: na ca tatrāpi prānte raso 'bhivyajyata eveti vācyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1437: rasas tu tatra vyajyamāno 'py acamatkāritvān na dhvanivyapadeśahetur ity api na śakyaṃ vaditum/
GK16jgrasg1u:1440: astu vā prādhānyena dhvanyamānasyāpi bhāvasya prānte rasābhivyañjakatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1444: bhāvādicarvaṇāyām atiprasaṅgavāraṇāya carvaṇāviṣayeti cittavṛttiviśeṣaṇam iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1459: na tv ekasmin vyābhicāriṇi dhvanyamāne vyabhicāryantaraṃ vyañjakatayāvaśyam apekṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1461: vastutas tu prakaraṇādivaśāt prādhānyam anubhavati kasmiṃś cid bhāve tadīyasāmagrīvyaṅgyatvena nāntarīyakatayā tanimānam āvahato vyabhicāryantarasyāṅgatve 'pi na kṣatiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1467: ata eva nāntarīyakasya bhāvasya dhvananaṃ bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1471: yadi tu kvacit saṃbhavatas tadā na vāryete/
GK16jgrasg1u:1476: etena vātsalyākhyaṃ putrādyālambanaṃ rasāntaram iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1483: tathotpattiś ca putrāder vibhāvo yatra jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1485: aśrusvedādayaś cānubhāvā harṣaṃ tam ādiśet//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1488: avalokya samāgataṃ tadā mām atha rāmā vikasanmukhī babhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1493: “tanmañju mandahasitaṃ śvasitāni tāni sā vai kalaṅkavidhurā madhurānanaśrīḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1494: adyāpi me hṛdayam unmadayanti hanta sāyaṃtanāmbujasahodaralocanāyāḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1497: yady apy atrāsyā eva smṛteḥ saṃcāriṇyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1499_1: rasadhvanitvaṃ śakyate vaktum tathāpi smṛter evātra puraḥsphūrtikatvāc camatkāritvāc ca taddhvanitvam
GK16jgrasg1u:1501: tadāder buddhisthaprakārāvacchinne śaktir iti naye buddheḥ śakyatāvacchedakānugamakatayā na vācyatāsaṃsparśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1502: buddhisthatvaṃ śakyatāvacchedakam iti naye 'pi smṛtitvena smṛter vyaktivedyataiva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1503: tasyāś cātra vākyavedyatve 'pi padasyaiva kurvadrūpatvāt padadhvaniviṣayatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1504: etena bhāvānāṃ padavyaṅgatve na vaicitryam iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1513: anyasya tu vyañjitasya bhāvatvam iti siddhāntāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1514: kiṃ tu vibhāva eva sundaratvāt kathaṃcid rasaparyavasāyī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1515: strīṇāṃ puruṣamukhāvalokanādeḥ puṃsāṃ ca pratijñābhaṅgaparābhavāder utpanno vaivarṇyādhomukhatvādikāraṇībhūtaś cittavṛttiviśeṣo vrīḍā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1526: “niruddhya yāntīṃ tarasā kapotīṃ kūjatkapotasya puro dadāne/
GK16jgrasg1u:1527: mayi smitārdraṃ vadanāravindaṃ sā mandamandaṃ namayāṃbabhūva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1528: pūrvatra trāsa ivātrāpi harṣo leśatayā sannapi vrīḍāyā anuguṇa eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1535: āgatam api taṃ savidhe paricayahīneva vīkṣate bālā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1540: naivākarṣaty ambu naivāmbujāliṃ kāntāpetaḥ kṛtyaśūnyo gajendraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1543: “saṃtāpayāmi hṛdayaṃ dhāvaṃ dhāvaṃ dharātale kim aham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1548: nanu cottarārdhe cintā nāstīti vastuno 'bhivyakteḥ katham asya dhṛtibhāvadhvanitvam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1550: kim aniṣṭaṃ mama bhaviṣyatīty ākāraś cittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ śaṅkā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1552: “vidhivañcitayā mayā na yātaṃ sakhi saṃketaniketanaṃ priyasya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1553: adhunā bata kiṃ vidhātukāmo mayi kāmo nṛpatiḥ punar na jāne//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1556: iyaṃ tu bhayādyutpādanena kampādikāriṇī, na tu cintā/
GK16jgrasg1u:1560: priyam āgatam api savidhe satkurute madhuravīkṣaṇair eva//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1562: madhuravīkṣaṇair evety evakāreṇa bodhyamānā pratyudgamacaraṇanipatanāśleṣādīnāṃ nivṛttir anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1566: teṣāṃ mate cittavṛttyātmakeṣu bhāveṣu nāśarūpāyā glāneḥ kathaṃ samāveśa iti dhyeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1567: yady api “balasyāpacayo glānir ādhivyādhisamudbhavaḥ” iti lakṣaṇavākyād apacayaśabdena nāśa eva pratiyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1568: tathāpi prāg uktānupapattyā balanāśajanyaṃ duḥkham eva balāpacayaśabdena
GK16jgrasg1u:1573: adhunā mama kutra sā satī patitasyeva parā sarasvatī//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1575: atra sītāparityāgarūpo 'parādhas tajjanyaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1582: atra hatakena mayā vivāsitā na tu vidhinety etasyārthasya patitopamayaiva paripoṣaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1584: yataḥ śūdrasya jātyaiva śrutidaurlabhyaṃ vidhinā kṛtam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1585: patitasya tu brāhmaṇāder vidhinā śrutisulabhatve svabhāvena kṛte 'pi tenaiva tathāvidhaṃ pāpam ācaratā svataḥ śrutir dūrīkṛteti tasya patitena sāmyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1586: tasyāś ca śrutyety upamālaṃkāro dainyam evālaṃkurute/
GK16jgrasg1u:1587: tathā mayeti seti copādānalakṣaṇāmūladhvanibhyāṃ kṛtaghnatvakṛtajñātvanirdayatvadayāvatītvādyanekadharmaprakāśanadvārā tad eva paripoṣyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1594: adhṛtiś cānubhāvāḥ syuḥ sā cintā parikīrtitā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1595: vitarko 'syāḥ kṣaṇe pūrve pāścāttye vopajāyate//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1596: “dhyānaṃ cintā hitānāpteḥ saṃtāpādikarī matā/” iti ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1599: akṛtapratimā tanuḥ kṛtā vidhinā kasya kṛte mṛgīdṛśaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1603: kasya kṛtaity anirdhāritadharmyālambanāyāś cintāyā eva pratīyamānatayā sato 'py autsukyasyaitadvākyena prādhānyenā 'bodhanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1613: avyaktāsaṃgatavākyaiḥ sukumāraskhaladgatyā ca yo 'bhinīyate sa ādyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1617: “madhurataraṃ smayamānaḥ svasminn evālapañ śanaiḥ kim api/
GK16jgrasg1u:1621: atra mattasvabhāvavarṇanasya tanniṣṭhamadavyañjanārthatvān madabhāva eva pradhānam iti na svabhāvoktyalaṃkārasyaprādhānyam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1624: “madhurasān madhuraṃ hi tavādharaṃ taruṇi madvadane viniveśaya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1625: mama gṛhāṇa kareṇa karāmbujaṃ papapatāmi hahā bhabhabhūtale//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1628: pūrvārdhagatā grāmyoktir uttarārdhe ca taruṇīkare 'mbujopameyatayā nirūpaṇīye svakarasya tadupameyatayā nirūpaṇaṃ ca madam eva poṣayataḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1633: niḥśvāsairjṛmbhitair mandaiḥ pādotkṣepaiḥ śramo mataḥ//” iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1635: ayaṃ ca saty api bale jāyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:1641: cirāya citre likhiteva tanvī na spandituṃ mandam api kṣamāsīt//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1645: suṣuptau hi jñānarāhityenaiva yatnarāhityān mandam api spandituṃ na kṣamāsīd ity asyānatiprayojanakatvāpatteḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1650: “ā mūlād ratnasānor malayavalayitād ā ca kūlāt payodher
GK16jgrasg1u:1651: yāvantaḥ santi kāvyapraṇayanapaṭavas te viśaṅkaṃ vadantu/
GK16jgrasg1u:1653: vācām ācāryatāyāḥ padam anubhavituṃ ko 'sti dhanyo madanyaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1658: ayaṃ tu garvapradhāna iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1659_0: tathā hi vīrarasaprasaṅge prāg udāhṛte “yadi vakti-“ityādi padye gīṣpatināgirām adhidevatayāpi
GK16jgrasg1u:1659_1: sākam ahaṃ vadiṣyāmīti vacanenābhivyaktasyotsāhasya paripoṣakatayā sthitaḥ sarvebhyaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:1660: na tu prakṛtapadya iva nāsty eva mahītale madanya iti sphuṭoditena solluṇṭhavacanenānubhāvena prādhānyena pratīyamānaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1665: bodhitāpi bubudhe madhūpair na prātar ānanajasaurabhalubdhaiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1671: “nikhilaṃ jagad eva naśvaraṃ punar asmin nitarāṃ kalevaram/
GK16jgrasg1u:1672: atha tasya kṛte kiyānayaṃ kriyate hanta mayā pariśramaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1683: iha tatprabhavo bhāvo vyādhir ity abhidhīyate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1685: “hṛdaye kṛtaśaivalānuṣaṅgā muhur aṅgāni yatas tataḥ kṣipantī/
GK16jgrasg1u:1686: tadudantapare mukhe sakhīnām atidīnām iyam ādadhāti dṛṣṭim//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1695: ārād upākarṇya giraṃ madīyāṃ saudāminīyāṃ suṣamā mayāsīt//
GK16jgrasg1u:1702: kuru kaśāṃ karābje karuṇāvati kampate mama svāntam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1703: khelan na jātu gopair amba vilambaṃ kariṣyāmi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1708: netranimīlanādayas tu nidrāyā evānubhāvā na tv asya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1710: yat tu prācīnaiḥ “asyānubhāvā nibhṛtagātranetranimīlanaṃ” ityādy uktaṃ tadanyathāsiddhānām api teṣām etadbhāvavyāpakatvād iti dhyeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1713: tava paricitaḥ snehaḥ samyaṅ mayety anubhāṣiṇīm/
GK16jgrasg1u:1715: ka iha bhavatīṃ bhadre nidre vinā vinivedayet//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1716: eṣā pravāsagatasya svapne 'pi priyām evaṃbhāṣiṇīṃ dṛṣṭavato nidrāṃ prati kasyacid uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1717: yady apy evaṃbhūtāyāḥ priyatamāvasthāyā nivedanena nidre mama bhavatyā mahānupakāraḥ kṛta iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1720: na prānte tayor dhvananaṃ niroddhum īṣṭe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1722: nidrānāśaś ca tatpūrtisvapnāntabalavacchabdasparśādibhir jāyata iti ta evātra vibhāvāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1726: “nitarāṃ hitayādya nidrayā me bata yāme carame niveditāyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1727: sudṛśo vacanaṃ śṛṇomi yāvan mayi tāvat pracukopa vārivāhaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1730: kecid avidyādhvaṃsajanyam apy amum āmananti/ teṣāṃ mate--
GK16jgrasg1u:1734: na tu vārivāhaviṣayāyā asūyāyā evātra vākyārthateti śaṅkyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1735: vibodhapratītau hi satyāṃ tasminn anaucityāvagame saty anucitavibodhajanakatvena vārivāhe 'sūyāyā vilambena pratīteḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1738: yadi vārivāhe niṣkaruṇatvādibodhakaṃ kiṃcid api syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1741: astu vā svapnabhāvapraśamenāsūyayā ca sahāsya saṃkaraḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1744: nidrāṃ vihāya sa prātar āliliṅgātha cetanām//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1746: yathā kaścit satyapratijño dvābhyāṃ nāyikābhyāṃ dvau kālāv upabhogārthaṃ dattvā yathocite kāla ekām upabhujya kālakantare pravṛtte tāṃ vihāyāparāṃ bhuṅkte,
GK16jgrasg1u:1747: tathaivāyaṃ rātrau nidrāṃ prātaś cetanām iti samāsokter eveha prakāśanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1753: śoṇāgrābhyāṃ bhāminī locanābhyāṃ joṣaṃ joṣam joṣam evāvatasthe//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1756: nanu krodhāmarṣayoḥ sthāyisaṃcāriṇor bhāvayoḥ kiṃ bhedakam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:1758: tatra tu gamakaṃ jhaṭiti paravināśādau pravṛttir vacanavaimukhyādikaṃ ceti kāryavailakṣaṇyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1759: vrīḍādibhir nimittair harṣādyanubhāvānāṃ gopanāya janito bhāvaviśeṣo 'vahittham//
GK16jgrasg1u:1772: adhikṣepāpamānādiprabhavā kim asya karomītyādyākārā cittavṛttir ugratā//
GK16jgrasg1u:1775: vibhāvāḥ syur atho bandho vadhas tāḍanabhanabhartsane//
GK16jgrasg1u:1778: “avāpya bhaṅgaṃ khalu saṃgarāṅgaṇe nitāntam aṅgādhipater amaṅgalam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1779: paraprabhāvaṃ mama gāṇḍivaṃ dhanur vinindatas te hṛdayaṃ na kampate//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1780: eṣā karṇena parābhūtaṃ gāṇḍivaṃ nindantaṃ yudhiṣṭhiraṃ prati dhanaṃjayasyoktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1783: na cāmarṣogratayor nāsti bheda iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1790: “akaruṇahṛdaya priyatama muñcāmi tvām itaḥ paraṃ nāham/
GK16jgrasg1u:1791: ity ālapati karāmbujam ādāyālījanasya vikalā sā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1793: pravāsagataṃ svanāyikāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantaṃ nāyakaṃ prati kasyāścit saṃdeśahāriṇyā uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1796: unmādasya vyādhāv antarbhāve saṃbhavaty api pṛthag upādānaṃ vyādhyantarāpekṣayā vaicitryaviśeṣasphoraṇāya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1798: na cātra prāṇaviyogātmakaṃ mukhyaṃ maraṇam ucitaṃ grahītum/
GK16jgrasg1u:1800: bhāveṣu ca sarveṣu kāryasahavartitayā śarīraprāṇasaṃyogasya hetutvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1803: adhunā khalu hanta sā kṛśāṅgī giram aṅgīkurute na bhāṣitāpi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1806: hantapadasyātrātyantam upakārakatvād vākyavyaṅgyo 'py ayaṃ bhāvaḥ padavyaṅgyatām āvahati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1807: etena bhāvasya padavyaṅgyatāyāṃ nātyantaṃ vaicitryam iti parāstam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1808: dayitasya guṇān anusmarantīty anena vyajyamānaṃ “caramāvasthāyām api tasyā dayitaguṇavismaraṇaṃ nābhūd” iti vastu,
GK16jgrasg1u:1809: vipralambhasya śokasya vā caramam abhivyaktasya poṣakam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1810: ayaṃ ca bhāvaḥ svavyañjakavākyottaravartinā vākyāntareṇa saṃdarbhaghaṭakena nāyikādeḥ pratyujjīvanavarṇane vipralambhasya,
GK16jgrasg1u:1811: anyathā tu karuṇasya poṣaka iti vivekaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1812: kavayaḥ punar amuṃ prādhānyena na varṇayanti,
GK16jgrasg1u:1816: “yadi sā mithilendranandinī nitarām eva na vidyate bhuvi/
GK16jgrasg1u:1817: atha me katham asti jīvitaṃ na vinālambanam āśritasthitiḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1819: bhuvi sītāsti na veti saṃdeho 'tra vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1823: kiṃ bhaviṣyati kathaṃ bhaviṣyatīty ādy ākārāyāś cintāyāḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:1824: idam itthaṃ bhavitum arhati prāyaśa ityākārasya vitarkasya viṣayavailakṣaṇyopalambhāc ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:1829: duryodhanasya jīvita katham iva nādyāpi niryāsi//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1833: asminn eva ca viṣādadhvanau duryodhanasyety arthāntarasaṃkramitavācyadhvanir anugrāhakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1844: ślathaya gatim ahaṃ no saṃgaraṃ draṣṭum īhe/
GK16jgrasg1u:1849: leśatayā pratitau vā trāsa evānuguṇyaucityena dhvanivyapadeśāyogyatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1863: darpadurvilasito daśānanaḥ kutra yāmi nikaṭe kulakṣayaḥ//
GK16jgrasg1u:1867: na cātra cintā prādhānyena vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1868: kutra yāmīti sphuṭaṃ pratītena sthairyābhāvenodvegasyeva cintāyā apratyāyanāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1869: paraṃ tv āvegacarvaṇāyāṃ tatparipoṣakatayā guṇatvena cintāpi viṣayībhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1871: iyaṃ ca mohāt pūrvataḥ parataś ca jāyate/
GK16jgrasg1u:1876: sā pūrvaṃ parato vā syān mohād iti vidāṃ matam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1878: “yad avadhi dayito vilocanābhyāṃ sahacari daivavaśena dūrato 'bhūt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1879: tad avadhi śithilīkṛto madīyair atha karaṇaiḥ praṇayo nijakriyāsu//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1881: karaṇaiś cakṣuḥśravaṇādibhiḥ kriyāsu tattatpramitiṣu praṇayasya śithilīkaraṇam anubhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1883: tu prakāraviśeṣavaiśiṣṭyena bāhulyenājananam iti tasmād asya viśeṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1889: tena kāryākaraṇarūpasyānubhāvasya tulyatve 'pi glāner jaḍatāyāś cāsya bhedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1892: rajanīṃ priyeṇa dūrād upayātena vibodhitā kathābhiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1893: adhikaṃ na hi pārayāmi vaktuṃ sakhi mā jalpa tavāyasī rasajñā//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1894: eṣā hi priyāgamanadvitīyadivase muhurniśāvṛttāntaṃ pṛcchantīṃ sakhīṃ prati rajanijāgaraṇajanitālasyāyāḥ kasyāścid uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1897: jaḍatāyāṃ mohāt pūrvavartitvam uttaravartitvaṃ vā niyatam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1899: gopanīyaviṣayatvād yadi kathābhir ity avivakṣitavācyaṃ tadā śramo 'stu paripoṣakaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1900: śramajanye hy ālasye śramasya poṣakatāyā avāryatvāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1901: atitṛptyādijanite tv ālasye śramād viviktaviṣayatvaṃ bodhyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1905: “kutra śaivaṃ dhanur idaṃ kva cāyaṃ prākṛtaḥ śiśuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1907: eṣā bhagnaharakārmukasya bhagavato rāmasya parākramam asahamānānāṃ tatratyānāṃ rājñām uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1908: atra ca śrīmaddāśarathibalasya sarvotkṛṣṭatāyā darśanaṃ vibhāvaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1911: maunaṃ muñcati kiṃ ca kairavakule kāme dhanur dhunvati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1913: dhātaḥ kiṃ nu vidhau vidhātum ucito dhārādharāḍambaraḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1915: kavigatā vidhātrālambanāsūyā vyajyata iti śakyate vaktum,
GK16jgrasg1u:1918: nahi vidhātur aparādha iva bhagavato rāmasyāparādho 'sti yena kaver iva vīrāṇām apy amarṣo 'bhivyajyeta/
GK16jgrasg1u:1920: atrāprastutacandravṛttāntena prastutarājakumārādivṛttāntasya dhvananān nāsty asūyādhvanitvam iti tu na vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1923: teṣāṃ ca padadhvanibhiḥ saha sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ kutrāpi na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1925: vyādhitvenāsya kathane 'pi viśeṣākāreṇa punaḥ kathanaṃ bībhatsabhayānakayor asyaiva vyādher aṅgatvaṃ nānyasyeti sphoraṇāya/
GK16jgrasg1u:1935: iti yatra vibhāvāḥ syur anubhāvas tu bhartsanam//
GK16jgrasg1u:1941: ātmānaṃ hantum icchāmi yena tvam asi bhāvitaḥ//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1942: eṣā bhagavadanuraktivighaṭanopāyam apaśyataḥ prahlādaṃ prati hiraṇyakaśipor uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1945: na cāmarṣa evātra vyajyata iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1946: sadaiva bhagavadanurāgiṇi prahlāde hiraṇyakaśipor amarṣasya cirakālasaṃbhṛtatvenātmavadhecchāyā idaṃprathamatānupapatteḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1947: idaṃprathamakāryasya cedaṃprathamakāraṇaprayojyatayā prācīnacittavṛttivilakṣaṇāyā eva capalatākhyacittavṛtteḥ siddheḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1948: na cāmarṣaprakarṣa evātmavadhecchādikāraṇam abhivyajyatām iti vācyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1952: uttameṣu tv avajñādibhir janitā viṣayadveṣākhyā rodanadīrghaśvāsadīnamukhatādikāriṇī cittavṛttir nirvedaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1954: “yadi lakṣmaṇa sā mṛgekṣaṇā na madīkṣāsaraṇiṃ sameṣyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:1955: amunā jaḍajīvitena me jagatā vā viphalena kiṃ phalam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1964: api tu bhagavadaiśvaryam avāṅmanasagocara iti cet tathāpi tādṛśabhagavadaiśvaryavarṇanānubhāvitayā kavigatabhagavadālambanaratyā dhvanitvam akṣatam eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:1966: “na dhanaṃ na ca rājyasaṃpadaṃ na hi vidyām idam ekam arthaye/
GK16jgrasg1u:1967: mayi dhehi manāg api prabho karuṇābhaṅgitaraṅgitāṃ dṛśam//“
GK16jgrasg1u:1968: atra dhanādyapekṣāśūnyasya bhagavaddṛgantapātābhilāṣo hi bhagavaty atyantānuraktiṃ vyanakti/
GK16jgrasg1u:1971: mātsaryodvegadambherṣyāvivekanirṇayaklaibyakṣamākutukotkaṇṭhāvinayasaṃśayadhārṣṭyādīnām api tatra tatra lakṣyeṣu darśanāt iti cet, na/
GK16jgrasg1u:1983: cāpalād dhārṣṭyasya ca vastutaḥ sūkṣme bhede 'pi nāntarīyakatayā tadanatiriktasyaivādhyavasāyāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1985: eṣu ca saṃcāribhāveṣu madhye kecana keṣāṃcana vibhāvā anubhāvāś ca
GK16jgrasg1u:1987: tathā hi-- īrṣyāyā nirvedaṃ prati vibhāvatvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:1993: vibhāvādāv anaucityaṃ punar lokānāṃ vyavahārato vijñeyam/
GK16jgrasg1u:1994: yatra teṣām ayuktam iti dhīr iti kecid āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:1996: munipatnyādiviṣayakaratyādeḥ saṃgrahe 'pi bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca rater asaṃgrahāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:1999: itthaṃ cānucitavibhāvālambanāyā bahunāyakaviṣayāyā anubhayaniṣṭhāyāś ca saṃgraha iti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2020: na cātra cakitanayanām ity anena parapuruṣasparśatrāsābhivyaktyā rater anubhayaniṣṭhatety ābhāsatāhetur vācyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2021: asyāś ca cirāya tasminn āsaktāyā antaḥpure parapuruṣāgamanasyātyantam asaṃbhāvanayā ka eṣa māṃ bodhayatīty ādāv ucita eva trāsaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2022: anantaraṃ ca paricayābhivyaktyā so 'yaṃ matpriyo madarthaṃ prāṇān api tṛṇīkṛtyāgata iti jñānād utpannaṃ harṣam abhivyañjayat smeravadanām iti viśeṣaṇaṃ ratiṃ tadīyām api vyanakti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2023: paraṃ tu prādhānyaṃ nāyakaniṣṭhāyā eva rateḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2027: taruṇeṣu vilocanābjamālām atha bālā pathi pātayāṃbabhūva//
GK16jgrasg1u:2028_0: atra kutaś cid āgacchantyāḥ pathi tadīyarūpayauvanagṛhītamānasair yuvabhir anugamyamānāyāḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:2028_3: varṇanād abhivyajyamānā ratir bahuvacanena bahuviṣayā gamyata iti bhavaty ayam api rasābhāsaḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:2032: atra rater navavadhvā manāg apy asparśād anubhayaniṣṭhatvenābhāsatvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2044: paramākulatayā paramasaundaryaprayojyaṃ nakulasahadevayor autsukyaṃ ca vyañjayantībhir dṛgbhiḥ pāñcālyā bahuviṣayāyā rater abhivyañjanād rasābhāsa eveti navyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2045: prāñcas tv apariṇetṛbahunāyakaviṣayatve rater ābhāsatety āhuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2050: “vyatyastaṃ lapati kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇam atho maunaṃ samālambate
GK16jgrasg1u:2051: sarvasmin vidadhāti kiṃ ca viṣaye dṛṣṭi nirālambanām/
GK16jgrasg1u:2052: śvāsaṃ dīrgham urīkaroti na manāg aṅgeṣu dhatte dhṛtiṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:2054: atra sītālambaneyaṃ laṅkeśagatā vipralambharatir anubhayaniṣṭhatayā jagadgurupatnīviṣayakatayā cābhāsatāṃ gatā,
GK16jgrasg1u:2055: vyatyastaṃ lapatīty ādibhir uktibhir vyajyamānair unmādaśramamohacintāvyādhibhis tathaivābhāsatāṃ gataiḥ prādhānyena paripoṣyamāṇā dhvanivyapadeśahetuḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2056: evaṃ kalahaśīlakuputrādyālambanatayā vītarāgādiniṣṭhatayā ca varṇyamānaḥ śokaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2070: gurukule vidyābhyāsasamaye tadīyakanyālāvaṇyagṛhītamānasasyānyasya vā kasya cid apratiṣiddhagamanāṃ smarato deśāntaraṃ gatasyeyam uktiḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2073: asyāṃ ca lokottaratvam abhivyajyamānaṃ vyatirekavapuḥsmṛtim eva puṣṇātīti saiva pradhānam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2074: evaṃ ca tyāgābhāvagataṃ sārvadikatvaṃ vyañjayanty adhidevatopamāpi/
GK16jgrasg1u:2076: yadi punar iyaṃ tatpariṇetur evoktis tadā bhāvadhvanir eva//
GK16jgrasg1u:2097: bhāvodaye vā pūrvaṃ bhāvaśānter āvaśyakatvān nānayor vivikto vyavahārasya viṣayaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2112: bhāvānāṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvam āpannānām udāsīnānāṃ vā vyāmiśraṇam//
GK16jgrasg1u:2115: “pāpaṃ hanta mayā hatena vihitaṃ kītāpi yady āpitā,
GK16jgrasg1u:2116: sā mām indumukhī vinā bata vane kiṃ jīvitaṃ dhāsyati/
GK16jgrasg1u:2117: ālokeya kathaṃ mukhāni kṛtināṃ kiṃ te vadiṣyanti māṃ
GK16jgrasg1u:2118: rājyaṃ yātu rasātalaṃ punar idaṃ na prāṇituṃ kāmaye//“
GK16jgrasg1u:2120: yat tu kāvyaprakāśaṭīkākāraiḥ “uttarottareṇa bhāvena pūrvapūrvabhāvopamardaḥ śabalatā” ity abhyadhītaya, tan na/
GK16jgrasg1u:2121_0: “paśyet kaścic cala capala re kā tvarāhaṃ kumārī hastālambaṃ vitara hahahā vyutkramaḥ
GK16jgrasg1u:2122: svottaraviśeṣaguṇena jāyamānas tu nāśo na vyaṅgyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2127: atredaṃ bodhyam-- ya ete bhāvaśāntyudayasaṃdhiśabalatādhvanaya udāhṛtās te 'pi bhāvadhvanaya eva/
GK16jgrasg1u:2128: vidyamānatayā carvyamāṇeṣv ivotpattyavacchinnatvavinaśyadavasthatvasaṃdhīyamānatvaparasparasamānādhikaraṇatvaiḥ prakāraiś carvyamāṇeṣu bhāveṣv eva prādhānyasyaucityāt,
GK16jgrasg1u:2130: yady apy utpattivināśasaṃdhiśabalatānāṃ tatsaṃbandhināṃ bhāvānāṃ ca
GK16jgrasg1u:2131: samānāyāṃ carvaṇāviṣayatāyāṃ na prādhānyaṃ vinigantuṃ śakyate,
GK16jgrasg1u:2133: bhāvaśāntyādiṣv api teṣv eva śāntipratiyogitvādibhir vyajyamāneṣu tasyāḥ kalpayitum aucityāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2134: kiṃ ca yadi bhāvaśāntyādau bhāvo na pradhānam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2135: kiṃ tu tadupasarjanakaśāntyādir evety abhyupeyate tadā vyajyamānabhāveṣv abhihitatatpraśamādiṣu kāvyeṣu bhāvapraśamādidhvanitvaṃ na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2140: (nanu)udayasya vācyatve 'pi bhāvasyāvācyatvād dhanitvaṃ sustham iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:2142: asmanmate tūtpatter vācyatve 'py utpattyavacchinnasyāmarṣasya pradhānasyāvācyatvād yukta eva bhāvodayadhvanivyapadeśaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2143: evaṃ vyajyamānabhāvapratiyogikasya praśamasya vācyatve bhāvaśāntidhvanitvaṃ na syāt/ yathā--
GK16jgrasg1u:2146: nanu śabdavācyānāṃ praśamādīnām aruṇakāntyaivānvayāt aruṇakāntipraśamāder eva vācyatvaṃ paryavasitam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2152: anyathā “sudṛśo nayanābjakoṇayoḥ” ity asyānvayo na syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2154: “nirvāsayantīṃ dhṛtim aṅganānāṃ śobhāṃ harer eṇadṛśo dhayantyāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2158: ubhayor apy avācyatvam apekṣitam iti cet,
GK16jgrasg1u:2161: tasmād bhāvapraśamādiṣv api prādhānyena bhāvānām eva camatkāritvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2162: praśamādes tūpasarjanatvam ato na tasya vācyatādoṣaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2163: idaṃ punar bhāvadhvanibhyo bhāvaśāntyādidhvanīnāṃ camatkāravailakṣaṇye nidānam-- yad ekatra carvaṇāyāṃ bhāveṣu sthityavacchinnāmarṣāditvam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2169_0: so 'yaṃ nigaditaḥ sarvo 'pi ratyādilakṣaṇo vyaṅgyaprapañcaḥ sphuṭe prakaraṇe jhagiti
GK16jgrasg1u:2169_1: pratiteṣu vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṣu sahṛdayatamena pramātrā sūkṣmeṇaiva samayeta
GK16jgrasg1u:2169_2: pratīyata iti hetuhetumatoḥ paurvāparyakramasyālakṣaṇād alakṣyakramo vyapadiśyate /
GK16jgrasg1u:2171: unneyā vā vibhāvādayas tatra sāmagrīvilambādhīnaṃ camatkṛter māntharyam iti saṃlakṣyakramo 'py eṣa bhavati/
GK16jgrasg1u:2172: yathā-- “talpagatāpi ca sutanuḥ” iti prāg udāhṛte padye “saṃprati” ity etadarthāvagatir vilambena/
GK16jgrasg1u:2179: rasabhāvādir artho dhvanyamāna eva, na vācyaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2180: tathāpi na sarvo 'lakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ” iti cābhinavaguptapādācāryāḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2181: syād etat, yady ayaṃ rasādiḥ saṃlakṣyakramasya viṣayaḥ syāt/
GK16jgrasg1u:2183: “tenāyaṃ dvādaśātmakaḥ” iti mammaṭoktiś ca na saṃgaccheta,
GK16jgrasg1u:2184_1: tribhir upādhibhis traividhyam āpannena ṣaḍātmanā vastvalaṃkārayor iva rasāder apy
GK16jgrasg1u:2185: atrocyate-- prakaṭair vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāribhir alakṣyakramatayaiva vyajyamāno ratyādiḥ sthāyibhāvo rasībhavati,
GK16jgrasg1u:2189: na rasāditvam iti teṣām āśayasya varṇanena na taduktīnāṃ virodhaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2191: rasabhāvādir artha ity atra rasādiśabdo ratyādiparaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2192: taditthaṃ nirūpitasyāsya rasādidhvaniprapañcasya padavarṇaracanāvākyaprabandhaiḥ padaikadeśair avarṇātmakai rāgādibhiś cābhivyaktim āmananti/
GK16jgrasg1u:2193: tatra vākyagatānāṃ padānāṃ sarveṣām api svārthopasthitidvārā vākyārthajñānopāyatve samāne 'pi kurvadrūpatayā camatkārāyogavyavacchinnatvena kasyacid eva dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2194: yathā “mandam ākṣipati” ity atra mandam ity asya/
GK16jgrasg1u:2195: racanāvarṇānāṃ tu padavākyāntargatatvena vyañjakatāvacchedakakoṭipraviṣṭatvam eva na tu vyañjakatvam iti yady api suvacam,
GK16jgrasg1u:2197: racanāviśiṣṭapadavākyatvena vā vyañjakatvam iti vinigamanāviraheṇa ghaṭādau daṇḍacakrādeḥ kāraṇatvasyeva pratyekam eva vyañjakatāyāḥ siddhir iti prāñcaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2200: na hi guṇyabhivyañjanaṃ vinā guṇābhivyañjakatvaṃ nāstīty asti niyamaḥ,
GK16jgrasg1u:2202_0: itthaṃ ca svasvavyañjakopanītānāṃ guṇināṃ guṇānām udāsīnānāṃ ca yathā parasparopaśleṣeṇaudāsīnyena
GK16jgrasg1u:2202_1: vā tattatpramitigocaratā tathā rasānāṃ tadguṇānāṃ cābhivyāktiviṣayateti tu navyāḥ /
GK16jgrasg1u:2203: udāharaṇaṃ tu “tāṃ tamāla” ityādi prāg uktam eva vākyasya vyañjakatāyām api “āvirbhūtā yad avadhi” ityādi ca/
GK16jgrasg1u:2205: ratnāvalyādīni ca śṛṅgārasya vyañjakatvān nidarśanāni prasiddhāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:2207: padaikadeśasya ca “nikhilam idaṃ jagad aṇḍakaṃ vahāmi” iti karūpataddhito vīrarasasya prāg evodāhṛtaḥ/
GK16jgrasg1u:2208: evaṃ rāgādibhir api vyaṅgyatve sahṛdayahṛdayam eva pramāṇam/
GK16jgrasg1u:2209: evam eṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ prādhānyena nirūpitāny udāharaṇāni/
GK16jgrasg1u:2213: nāmani rasapadaṃ tu ratyādiparam ity eke/
GK16jgrasg1u:2215: kiṃ tu na dhvanivyapadeśahetutvam ity apare//
